Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, Mere neck ke right hand side mein unilateral submandibular lymph node swelling hai.Kripya dekhiye neck mein hone wali kuch cheeze. Mere pass ultrasound hua tha aur is samay lymph node ka measurement 5-6 cm hai aur starting mein sudden hone ke sath dard tha. Teeno kursiyon ke baad antibiotics (Augmentin do dose aur Clindamycin ek dose), mujhe ek aur ultrasound ke liye refer kiya gaya tha. Ye ultrasound scan dikhaya ki lymph node 3 cm ho gaya hai lekin abhi tak mojud hai. Toh doctor ne FNAC order kiya. Iske results aa gaye hai aur metastasis ka koi sign nahi hai ya TB lymphadenopathy ka koi sign nahi hai. Doctor ne dobara Doxycycline ke antibiotics ka course suggest kiya hai aur lymph node ka measurement teen hafte baad remeasure karane ko kaha hai. FNAC mein kaha gaya hai ki yeh inflammatory lymph node hai. Kya iska matlab hai reactive lymph node. Aur kya aur koi cheez iska karan ho sakti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What else could be causing the unilateral submandibular lymph node swelling if it's not reactive or due to TB lymphadenopathy? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The middle of the neck is red and swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe do hafte pehle bottom tooth nikalvane ka operation hua tha, kuch dino baad mujhe extraction site par infection ho gaya, mai dentist ke paas gaya, unhone area saaf kiya aur antibiotics extraction tooth me daale, usi raat area fir se dard karne laga, aur kuch dino baad meri jibh par chale ho gaye, bahut dard ho raha tha, khana nahi kha pa raha tha aur neend nahi aa rahi thi, maine doctors ko phone kiya aur agli din ka appointment liya, us bich mai clorcydle mouthwash use kiya. Hinglish_Question: Lagbhag 2 1/2 mahine pehle, maine ek strip club mein jaake ek dancer se lap dance liya. Dance ke dauran usne apne honthon ko mere crotch par rakha. Mujhe jeans pehne the aur dance ke samay puri tarah se kapde pehne the. Mujhe yaqeen nahi hai ki mera ling underwear se bahar nikla tha, par jeans puri tarah bandh thi. Usne mere jeans mein saans bhari aur maine apne ling par uski saans mehsoos ki. Uski honth ya munh mere ling ya testicles se skin contact nahi kiya. Mai club mein uske private parts ya apne munh ya ling ko nahi chhua. Shayad ghar aate waqt maine apne chehre ko chua hoga, par mujhe yaad nahi hai. Lagbhag do aur aadhe hafte pehle mujhe bukhar aur sore throat hua, aur uske din baad mere haatho aur pairo ke talve mein dardnak chhale nikle, jismein kuch chhale blister bane. Abhi bhi chhale thik ho rahe hain. Unhe dard nahi hota hai par main abhi bhi dekh sakta hoon ki wahaan wo chhale they. Mujhe dar hai ki yeh syphillis ki wajah se ho raha hai. Kya syphillis ko ho sakta hai, jab aap kapdon mein bandhe ho, jaise ki agar uski thook kapde se bheeg gayi ho. Mujhe yaqeen nahi hai ki mere penis se precum nikla tha, lekin mujhe yaqeen hai ki maine apne underwear mein cum nahi kiya tha. Main bahut sure hoon ki mere jeans ke bahar bhi significantly wet nahi the.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 3 saal ke bete ke upper lip ke upar ek chota sa lal sa flat dot hai. Ismein koi drainage ya sujan nahi hai aur ye size waisa hi hai (ek pinprick jaise). Ye chala nahi jata. Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mai 42 saal ka mard hoon. Das mahine pehle, mujhe mera right eye mein acute posterior uveitis- Chorioretinitis with macular ka diagnosis hua tha. Kripya dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe ek intraocular injection ke saath corticosteroid mila aur maine do hafte tak Clindamycin ka treatment kiya, lekin koi actual cause ka evidence nahi mila. Maine bahut saare blood tests karwaye par kuch bhi suspicious nahi tha. Macular ka resolution mujhe lagbhag teen mahine baad mila aur tab tak mujhe nerve ke aaspaas hi inflammation thi, lekin ek hafte pehle jab maine Triamcinolone ke saath periocular injection liya (mera pehla periocular injection), tab se meri uveitis bahut tezi se badhne lagi hai aur mujhe 99% yakeen hai ki injection ne acute re-inflammation ka kaaran kiya hai. Maine padha hai ki ocular toxoplasmosis ke liye Triamcinolone ke saath preocular injection karna bahut risky hai, lekin baad mein pata chala. Meri vision abhi bahut kamjor hai, mai apne right eye se padh nahi sakta jabki do din pehle kar sakta tha. Mai dar gaya hoon aur samajh nahi pa raha hoon ki kya karu. Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor,For three months now, two days after finishing a 21-day course of antibiotics to clear an E.Coli UTI, I have redness on my meatus (मेटस) and lighter redness on my glans (ग्लैंस) and also intermittent irritation of the foreskin (फोरस्किन). I was sent to a dermatologist and she told me it might be a yeast infection (खमीर संक्रमण) and prescribed a two time 150 mg of Fluconazole (फ्लूकोनाजोल) which had absolutely no effect. I also prior to all my visits to the doctors tried treating myself topically a week at a time with multiple creams such as Canesten (कैनेस्टेन), Fucidin (फ्यूसिडिन), coconut oil (नारियल तेल), shea butter (शी बटर) which all do nothing but hydrate the skin. I have been taking probiotics and antifungal supplements, following a low sugar diet (मिठाई की कम मात्रा) for almost a month and nothing cuts it.I am starting to wonder if it could be something else than a fungal infection since nothing I have tried is working. Could it be bacterial (बैक्टीरियल). Are symptoms different (लक्षण अलग होते हैं). And if my symptoms are causing no pain could it be something else than an infection.उसका छवि नीचे संलग्न  की गई है।

Hinglish_Question: Prabandhak Mahodaya, peechle char mahine se mere do kohno ki rangat kaafi kali ho gayi hai aur twacha bahut sukhi aur usmein aur bhi jyada khujli ho rahi hai...maine uske liye prayog ke liye ek image bhi attach ki hai. Maine namak spa ka istemal kiya hai takki wo sakhtai ko dur kar sake, lekin ye sirf thodi der tak hi fayda deta hai...firse wapas aata hai. Kya sukhepan antarmukhi bimariyon ke lakshan hai? Abhi main lagatar 400 mg Vitamin E ki goliya le raha hoon, mujhe aasha hai ki aap mujhe sahi jawab de sakte hain...main aapke reply ka intezaar kar raha hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the black discoloration, dryness, rashes on elbows despite using salt spa and taking vitamin E? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Small muliple red spots present on the skin. Clustered spots of rash.

Hinglish_Question: Mere pati ko haatho ki kohni se niche aur taango ki ghutnoon se niche ek gambhir rash hai, unhone 9 doctors se dikhaya hai, lekin koi bhi unhe jawaab nahi de sakta tha. Unke taange sujni shuru ho jati hai aur phatne lagti hai, woh laal ho jaati hai aur bahut jyada khujli hoti hai. Jab woh taango aur haatho ko khujlate hain, toh unki twacha neeche utar jaati hai aur khoon behne lagta hai. Hum bilkul pareshan hain aur woh pagal ho rahe hain. Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a severe rash on the arms and legs, with swelling, open sores, itching, and bleeding? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere neeche ka haddi, left side, tender hai - skin nahi hai - teeth nahi hai - tissue hai, main samajhta hoon. Swelling nahi hai. Mujhe laga ki ye daant ho sakte hain, lekin maine haal hi mein dentist ko dikhaya tha. Ye left side ke hisse tak hi jaari hai meri gardan mein. Please dekhiye neck par kuch ho gaya hai neeche. Sirf front side hai, back side nahi hai. Mujhe night-before-last notice hua tha, lekin kal din mein ye mehsoos nahi hua jab tak maine dinner aur TV dekhne ke liye baitha. Aaj subah bhi tender hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing tenderness in the lower jaw, left side, extending to the neck, with no swelling, a recent dental visit, and a neck swelling? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The lower neck is swollen accompanied with redness.

Hinglish_Question: Mere daanto ke beech mein chote-chote ubhar aaye hain lekin bilkul akhiri tak nahi aur dono eye teeth ke upar hoth ki neeche kuch bare ubhar aaye hain. Kripya dekhein doctor affected area ki image below. They don't hurt aur bleed bhi nahi karte hain aur mujhe sach mein koi pareshani nahi ho rahi hai, lekin jab main brush ya khana khatam karta hoon toh meri masudo mein redness ho jati hai. Mujhe pehle kabhi aisa ubhar ya redness nahi hua tha. Kuch hafte pehle main dentist ke paas gaya tha periodontal cleaning aur scraping ke liye aur unhein bahut badiya nahi laga, lekin yeh theek nahi ho raha hai. Koi sujhav hai kya?
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient query: What could be causing small bumps between teeth, larger bumps above eye teeth, and redness after brushing or eating? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Red and little raised patches all over the face. Some are spots are darker in color.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor,.Meri mother ko lips ke andar sujan hai. Ye dardnak nahi hai aur ye theek hone ki bajaye badh rahi hai. Unhone doctor se consult kiya tha. Doctor ne bataya ki ye sujan ek allergic reaction ki wajah se ho gayi hai. Kya ye cancer hai. Please suggest. Uski image neeche attach ki hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is a painless, non-healing lip swelling, diagnosed as an allergic reaction, indicative of cancer? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. The left side of lower lip contains the swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Mere bete ko kuch din se khansi aur bhari naak hai aur uske aankhon se pani aur gooey nikalta hai. Kal jab usne ek neend li thi to maine dekha ki uske aankhon me laal chunawala tha. Aa j irritates his eye usually when he crist it aur aaj uska right eye suj gaya hai. Main kuch sujhav to nahi de sakta par garam bhiga hua kapda se usko saaf kar sakte hain. Uske lie image neeche di gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What should be done for a child with a cough, runny nose, watery and gooey eyes, bloodshot eyes, and a swollen eye? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Big swelling of the entire eyelid and also below the eye. Looks Dark red and little shiny.

Hinglish_Question: Kripya bataiye ki kya ye lakshan kidney problems ka karan ho sakte hain aur ye kya ho sakte hain. aur mujhe kitne samay mein exam ke liye tayyar hona chahiye. Maine MRI brain karaya tha tumor ya stroke ke liye, par sab negative the, woh face swelling nahi kar rahe the. nausea/vomiting, mere skin mein kuch problem hai, ek taraf eyelid ptosis hai, upper mouth mein kuch problem hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Dental abscess nikala gaya, swallowing mein taklif ho rahi hai. HCTZ ne mere ungliyo mein swelling badha di thi, isliye maine ise do dino ke baad hi band kar diya. Lab results mein low bicarbonate 22 aur low vitamin d hydrox-25 at a level of 65 aaya hai, high blood pressure, eyes mein problem hai (eye doc ne kaha cholesterol jyada ho sakta hai lekin ab tak normal hai) aur main toilet bowl mein urinary casts ko ghumte dekh sakta hoon (woh transparent cigar shape jaise dikhte hain).
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of facial swelling, nausea/vomiting, skin rash, eyelid ptosis, lip swelling, difficulty swallowing, and urinary casts moving in the toilet bowl? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Lower lip's right part swollen with a thick dark red line appearing below and above the same part with dryness.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mera 8 mahine ka beta 2 mahine ke lagbhag se eczema se pareshan hai. Shayad ye allergies ki wajah se hai. Humne bahut kuch try kiya hai uski pareshani ka karan khojne ke liye, lekin ise lambe samay tak dur nahi kar paye. Mere pramukh chinta ka karan ye hai ki past few months se uski digestion me samasya hai. Wo bahut aasani se kabz ho jata hai aur use aise cheezein khani padti hai jisse wo uncomfortable na ho. Usne is tak sirf breastfeeding ki hai, lekin haal hi mein usne khud hi chhod diya hai. Wo solids bahut khata hai aur diluted juice peeta hai. Mai use dairy products nahi deti kyunki usko formula se pehle hi kharab reaction hua tha. Jab use yogurt try karwaya to uske honthon me sujan aayi. Kripya doctor, is vartaman sthiti ko dekhein. Wo sirf 13 pounds ka hai 8 mahine me, jo bahut kam hai. Wo achhe se khata hai, lekin phir bhi itna chhota hai. Wo crawling ya scooting nahi karta hai; wo akela baith sakta hai aur sabkuch dekhta hai. Wo aam se jyada sota hai. Wo jyadatar samay mai hi pakda jana chahta hai. Wo aapki baat sunta hai aur aapko dhyan se dekhta hai; wo cheezein pakad sakta hai aur use ek haath se dusre haath me le sakta hai. Wo apne pacifier ko khud hi muh me dal sakta hai aur use cheezein purposefully giraana pasand karta hai. Wo jyada babble nahi karta aur meri ummeed ke mutabik jyada khel bhi nahi sakta.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of eczema, constipation, slow weight gain, delayed motor skills, excessive sleepiness, and limited interaction in an 8-month-old? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Central upper buldge swollen with redness and shiny appearance.

Hinglish_Question: Hindi  Hi doctor,Mere ankle par meri skin mein kuch problem hai. Ye ab 6 mahine se hai. Mene Penicillin, steroid antifungal cream aur cider vinegar try kiya hai, lekin ye dheere dheere badh raha hai. Isme khujli aur flaky skin hai. Jab me ise khujlata hoon toh red raised dots ke andar kuch fluid mehsus hota hai. Thodi der baad ye smell karna shuru ho jata hai. Kripya doctor, is vartaman condition ko dekhein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a persistent, enlarging, itchy rash on the ankle with flaky skin, fluid-filled dots, and an odor? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 6 weeks pehle MD ke eastern shore par chote laal machharon ne kaata tha. Ab mere jhut ke size ke laal daane ho gaye hain aur mere ghutno se panje tak kaanghon ki tarah suj gaya hai. Iska bahut khujli ho rahi hai. Maine antibiotics aur har tarah ke upay try kiye hain. Isne ek band ki tarah bhi kaam kiya hai, ghutno aur panje par sujan utpann karke. Koi sujhav hai kya? Iske image ko neeche attached kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing a rash with bite-sized red bumps and welts on the legs, along with swelling at the knees and ankles? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Meri lagbhag 3 saal ki beti ne kal subah snan liya aur use khujli hone lagi. Maine abhi tak koi daanein nahi dekhi....Kal dopahar mein maine use babysitter ke paas se uthaya aur uski skin ke color ke same small rash dekhein arm par.Kripya doctor, neeche di gayi current condition ko dekhein...Phir hum bahar garmi mein 2 ghante tak the, aur uske pure sharir par dheere dheere ye daane ho gaye jo ab laal ho gaye. Jab woh thandi hui toh woh poore tarah gayab ho gaye...Aaj subah snan ke baad, uski poora bottom laal ho gaya aur bumpy aur khujli kar raha tha. Haath aur pairon ke kuch jagah bhi thi. 30 minutes ke baad completely gayab ho gaye...Aaj dupahar ke neend mein, jahan woh so rahi thi, waha uski chehre par outbreak hua, jiski baad mein woh bhi gayab ho gaye...Hum bahar khel rahe the start hote hi woh phir se ho gaye aur andaar aate hi woh wapas gayab ho gaye. Lag raha hai jaise garmi ki wajah se ho raha hai, lekin ye kyun bar bar aata hai? Kya kabhi ye ana band ho jayega...Mere behen ne abhi call kiya hai aur kaha ki uske twin boys bhi abhi snan karke aaye hain aur ab unhe bhi ye problem hai..
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the recurring rash that appears after heat exposure in a 3-year-old and her twin cousins? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Little red pinkish dots on the hands of the baby.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe bahut confusion ho rahi hai, um main abhi 12 hafte pregnant hoon aur lagbhag 2 ya 3 din se mujhe is tarah ka ek rash hai. Ye bahut chota hai aur red ya white lag raha hai, mujhe theek se samajh nahi aa raha. Ye mere butt cheek ke left side par hai, meri legs ke beech nahi hai, bas paas mein hai mere butt crack ke. Jal raha hai lekin khujli nahi ho rahi hai. Main enough paani pee rahi hoon aur mujhe koi infection nahi hai. Mujhe laga ki ye mere underclothes se aaya hai, jaise ki meri skin irritate ho gayi hai. Par kripaya madad kijiye, mujhe iski pareshani hone lagi hai. Image neeche attach ki gayi hai.

The image shows the condition of skin rash. A section of skin in dark pink coloration and little raised or swollen. Some ciruclar small patches are also present around it.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe apne gale ke left side mein apne gardan ke neeche, clavicle ke upar ek bada sujan ka anubhav ho raha hai. Doctor, kripya neeche di gayi image mein mere gale ke kuch problem ko dekhe. Ye bahut hi mulayam hai aur mere haath ke size mein poori tarah se bhara hua hai. Mere gale mein bhi thoda bhara sa lag raha hai. Isko chhu lene par dard hota hai. Ye bahut jaldi aur koi pehle se traum ya virus ke lakshan ke bina aa gaya hai. ... Iske liye aapki koi raay ya sujhav ke liye dhanyavaad.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe mere left hand side ki gaal pe kat liya gaya tha, bruise faint hai lekin ab meri skin ke neeche ek chota sa gaanth bani hai. Doctor, iski image attached hai neeche. Hinglish_Question: Mujhe april se ek prakar ki khujli wali daane wali khaal ki problem hai, jo pratidin aati jaati hai. Ye daane laal hote hain aur bahut khujli karte hain aur thodi der ke liye rehte hain phir chale jaate hain. Mein do baar doctor ke paas gaya hoon lekin ab tak koi diagnosis nahi hua hai. Ye khaal mere haath aur kandho ke upar rehti hai aur kuch daane meri bazu ke andar jaate hain lekin wahan khujli nahi hoti. Mein samajh nahi pa raha hoon ki ye kya ho sakta hai. Cortizone cream khujli mein koi madad nahi karti. Uski tasveer neeche attach ki gyi hai.

Hinglish_Question:
English:Mere paas bukhar tha jo ab khatam ho gaya hai aur swollen lymph glands bhi the aur mere gums aur lips bhi bahut jyada suj gaye the jo ek saath aaye hain. Kya aap koi aise tareeke recommend kar sakte hain jisse gums ki sujan kam ho sake, kyun ki ye khaana khane ko lagbhag na mumkin kar deti hai. Kripya doctor, niche di gayi image dekhein jahaan par effect hua hai.

Maine ek fever tha jo ab khatam ho gaya hai aur swollen lymph glands bhi the aur mere gums aur lips bhi bahut jyada suj gaye the jo ek saath aaye hain. Kya aap koi aise tareeke recommend kar sakte hain jisse gums ki sujan kam ho sake, kyun ki ye khaana khane ko lagbhag na mumkin kar deti hai. Kripya doctor, niche di gayi image dekhein jahaan par effect hua hai.

Mujhe frequently cold ho jata hai. Mujhe har chhe mahine mein typhoid fever ho jata hai. Mujhe kuch STD bhi hai, lekin mujhe nahi pata ki wo kaunsa hai. Mujhe pelvic area mein bhi dard hota hai. Mere genital warts hai aur meri skin mein kuch anormality, itching aur burning bhi hoti hai. 14 saal pehle bhi mujhe white spot in the throat hua tha.Iski image neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a white spot in the throat, frequent colds, recurring typhoid fever, STD symptoms, and genital warts? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. One of the tonsils are swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Main hoon 32 saal ki aur shaadi shuda hoon, mere paas ek 2.5 saal ka baccha hai... Mujhe 4 saal se skin ailment hai jise doctors determine nahi kar paaye hain. Meri pregnancy se pehle mujhe kaha gaya tha ki ye Pytriasis Rosia hai...Uska image neeche attach hai. Lekin meri pregnancy ke dauran meri skin theek ho gayi thi aur saare rashes gayab ho gaye the... Lekin ab phir se aagaye hain... Rashes sirf mere peeth par hain aur scalpe mein sabse zyada hain... Maine kayi dawao ka istemal kiya lekin koi faida nahi hua... Haal hi mein maine Omnacortil 40 liya aur wah bahut madad kar raha hai... Bas janna chahti hoon ki kya main ise jari rakhun ya kisi professional ki sahayata lein? Kripaya madad karein.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I continue using Omnacortil 40 for my recurring skin rash or should I seek professional help? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Oval shaped or circular red patches on the leg. Little swelling and dryness on the patches with foldings of skin.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste. The last couple of days mere gums suj gaye hai aur dard ho raha hai. Mostly neeche ki taraf zyada hai lekin upar thoda hai aur mere aankh thodi si royi hui hai aur sore throat aur thanda hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Gums bleed nahi ho rahe hai aur mein paracetamol le raha hoon. Mujhe lagta hai ye sinus issue nahi hai kyun ki normally ek area mein zyada hota hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is causing the swollen, painful gums, bloodshot eye, mild sore throat, and cold symptoms in this patient? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Left side of the lower lip swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mere potassium kam hai aur liver enzymes jyada hain. Doctor ne kaha ki 2 hafte ke liye potassium, B12 aur folic acid lekar checkup karayen aur possible Mg test bhi karen. Iron level bhi kam hai, lekin abhi bhi range ke andar hai. Mere baalon mein bohot jyada girna ho raha hai, neeche ki taraf sujan hai, khujli hoti hai. Doctor, iski image neeche attached hai, constant diarrhea aur aur bhi bahut kuch hai. Mera age 37 saal hai aur main ek overweight female hoon.

Is the patient's low potassium, high liver enzymes, hair loss, swelling, itchy skin, diarrhea, and weight contributing to her symptoms? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Pink coloured raised rash with yellow spots over it.
Condition- Dermatitis

Hinglish_Question: Abhi haal mein maine 3 hilne waale, dardnahin dene wale, gol ganthon ka aviskar kiya hai, un sabhi ko samanya roop se chhota samjhaya ja sakta hai, sabse bada jaise aam ka size hai, ek mere jaw line ke left side par hai, dusra mere jaw bone ki hinge ke neeche mere gardan ke upar hai (sabse bada) aur teesra meri garadn par hai, doctor kripya image dekhe patient ki, meri gardan mein kuch samaasya hai. Maine aur koi lakshan nahi dekhe hain aur ye twacha ke surface se dikhai nahi dete hain, inhe aap sirf dabav lagakar hi mehsoos kar sakte hain. Main 16 saal ka hoon aur mujhe koi aur swasthya sambandhit samasya nahi hai, koi sujhaav hai kya?
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of painless, movable, spherical lumps on the neck of a 16-year-old with no other symptoms? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck near the ear is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mere lower left wisdom tooth ko 7 din pehle nikal liya gaya tha. Abhi day 8 ka subah hai. Sab kuch acche se heal ho raha hai lekin mere lower lip, chin aur dant abhi bhi bahut suj gaye hain (sujan din bhar badhti hai), aur is area mein abhi bhi koi feeling nahi hai jab main palpate karta hun. Agar main apna bottom jaw aage le jane ki koshish karta hun toh mujhe tingling sensation hoti hai, jo main janta hun ki yeh nerve ki firing hai, lekin mujhe sujan ki chinta hai aur yeh bhi jaanna hai ki kya feelings wapas aayengi aur kitna samay lagega.Kripya doctor vartaman condition ki image dekhiye neeche.Main Ibuprophen (400mg din mein do se teen baar), magnesium aur Vitamin B12 le raha hun. Kya mujhe sujan rokne ke liye aur kuch kar sakte hai, kyunki dopahar tak meri moti hui lip or bhi moti ho jati hai aur sone tak bardasht se bahar ho jati hai. Aapke salah ka intezaar hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What can be done to reduce swelling in the lower left lip and chin area after a wisdom tooth extraction? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling.  Full lower lip extreme swelling present.

Hinglish_Question: Maine aaj subah apne upper lip ke thode si sujan ke saath utha. Maine ek Benadryl liya aur turant hi sujan kam hone lagi. Maine church mein bhi gaya aur ghar aane se pehle meri lip ka left side suj gaya. Uski image nichedehi hai.Jo image hai usko below attach kiya hua hai. Is baar maine 2 Benadryl liya lekin meri lip sujti rahi. Mujhe thoda sa headache bhi hai. Kya ye meri c-pap ke karan ho sakta hai aur main iske liye kya kar sakta hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing swelling of the upper lip, a headache, and the possibility of the C-PAP machine being involved? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling present on the upper lip with shiny appearance and slightly light coloured.

Hinglish_Question: Mera baby 12 mahine ka hai,wo bahut khush hai aur swasth hai, hum abhi Tenerife mein hain aur uske pet par ek rash aagayi hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Uski skin kaafi sensitive hai aur mujhe koi serious chinta nahi hai, mujhe bas kuch suggestions chahiye ki ye kya hai. Isko thoda sa heat rash ya prickly heat jaisa dikhta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the skin rash on a 12-month-old baby's torso, resembling heat rash or prickly heat? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Little red pinkish dots on the hands of the baby.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe ek sawal hai jo asap ki zarurat hai. Mujhe lagbhag ek hafte pehle ek hand rail par bahut hard gir gaya tha, meri hath ki taraf. Us jagah par yellow purple aur black bruise hua. Doctor, wo image neeche attached hai. Ab usmein ek badi hard lump hai aur touch karne par bahut sensitive hai. Kya mujhe iske liye doctor ke paas jaana chahiye? Mujhe isse dar lag raha hai, mujhe bahut aasani se panic attacks ho jaate hain. Main paxil par hoon jo thoda sa toh madad karta hai lekin ab bahut zyada nahin. Mujhe peshaab karne mein koi takleef nahi hai, khoon ka koi sign nahi hai lekin touch karne par bahut dard hota hai. Main research online karne ke chakkar mein pagal ho jaungi. Kya meri skin ke neeche khoon burst ho sakta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I seek medical attention for a big, hard lump on my hand that is sensitive to touch and bruised? The image shows the condition of hand lump. One big lump on the ring fingers upper side. Purplish in color and little shiny.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste. Mere wisdom teeth ko Wednesday ko remove kiya gaya tha (ab saturday raat hai). Mujhe do lower teeth nikalwaye gaye, unme se ek impacted tha. Impacted tooth mujhe pareshani de raha hai. Par main dry socket nahi hai sochta hoon, kyun ki mere symptoms ke karan. Meri gale (almost tonsils) bahut suj gayi hai aur nigalne mein dard hota hai. Main apna muh bhi bahut jyada nahi khol sakta. Ye day 2 ke sham se shuru hua hai. Mere actual stitches aur sockets to theek lag rahe hain, lekin wisdom teeth ke just neeche wala area gale mein suj jaise hai. Ye kuch muscle cramp ki tarah hai. Please, dekhiye affected area ka image doctor ko niche . Aapko kya lagta hai, kya mujhe infection hai ya dry socket hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's swollen throat, difficulty swallowing, limited jaw movement, and neck swelling below the wisdom teeth indicative of infection or dry socket? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck is swollen withe red rashes in the mouth.

Hinglish_Question: Mere dost Australia mein hai aur abhi call kiya hai ke uske poore sharir par khujli wale chote-chote ubhar aa gaye hain, jinhe usne ek pharmacy se liye gaye cream lagane par blister ho gaye hain. Uske haath aur paon bhi suj gaye hain. Doctor aap patient ki taraf se dekh sakte hain kuch issue hai meri legs mein, neeche ke wajah se. Ye uske thigh par kuch laal spots se shuru hua tha. Hinglish_Question: Hindi: Namaste doctor, meri 16 saal ki beti ko regular basis par tonsillitis ki problem hai. Use haal hi mein antibiotics prescribe kiye gaye the. Kuch saalon se meri beti ko ragged tonsils, continuous tonsil stones, bad breath aur sore throat hai. Wo har baar mushkil se guzar rahi hai, aur mujhe uski future health ke liye chinta hai kyunki ye ek chronic condition hai. Wo abhi Ibuprofen aur Paracetamol le rahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What are the potential long-term health impacts of chronic tonsillitis with tonsil stones and persistent symptoms in a 16-year-old? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils are swollen with no discolourations.

Hinglish_Question: Mere Priy Priy Sir, Mere bete 6 saal ke hai aur usko March se sore throat aur tonsilitis ho rahi hai. Usne pehle se hi 5 baar high fever ko experience kiya hai (har 2 hafte mein) aur uske tonsils suj jaate hai. Usne strep test karaya hai aur vo negative hai. Antistreptolisine test (blood test) ka result 50 hai. Isliye mujhe lagta tha ki use koi operation ki zarurat nahi hogi aur uske tonsils remove nahi karne padenge. Lekin, doctor (laryngologist) mujhe batate hai ki use tonsilectomy karani chahiye kyunki uske glands bahut kharab haalat mein hai aur ye future mein gambhir swasthya samasyaon ka karan ban sakte hai. Endocrinologist mujhe batate hai ki hume uske tonsils bachane ki koshish karni chahiye kyunki shayad vo shrink ho jaye. Ab 4 hafte ho gaye hai aur usko fever nahi hua hai lekin jab main uske muh mein dekhti hoon toh vo har teen ya chaar din mein suj jaate hai aur main use gargle karwati hoon aur lozenges deti hoon taki fever na ho. Please doctor, dekhein is vartaman condition ko neeche. Kya aap suggest kar sakte hai ki hum kya karein. Kya hum use tonsils remove karwaye? Vo bahut emotional baccha hai aur doctor ne kaha hai ki use general anesthesia ke neeche karwana padega. Main anesthesia aur tonsilectomy se thoda sa savdhan hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a 6-year-old boy with recurring sore throat, tonsillitis, and swollen tonsils have a tonsillectomy under general anesthesia? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils have swollen excessively in the back of the throat.

Mai bahut thaki hui hoon aur koi bhook nahi hai, aur dard unbearable hai, meri urine test acchi thi aur blood work bhi theek tha, isliye mai abhi bhi bahut pareshan hoon kya aapko lagta hai. Maaf kijiye mujhme paise nahi hai, aapko pareshan karne ka irada nahi tha, mai yahaan leti rahungi aur isse suffer karoongi jaise maine abhi tak kiya hai, dhanyavaad.

Hello

Kabhi-kabhi main itna khujlate hu ke meri skin bahut dry ho jati hai aur khoon chalne lagta hai. Ab mere 16 mahine ki beti ko bhi ye problem ho rahi hai. Kya ye ek heat rash ho sakti hai? Mujhe antibiotic diye gaye the aur instruction bhi di gayi thi ki agar ek hafte ke andar heal na ho toh ye fungal infection ka sanket ho sakta hai. Kya ye mere chehre par hone wale irritation se juda hai? Mere left eye ke kinar pe aur uske kone me ek dard wala patch hai. Kafi hafte ho gaye hain aur mujhe lagta hai ki ye hormone se kuch nahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's itchy dry skin on the face related to their scalp infection and possible fungal infection? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. The skin below the little is sprained and blood has coagulated.

Hinglish_Question: Main ek software engineer hoon jo bangalore mein ek software company ke liye kaam karta hoon. Mujhe apni mouth mein kuch problem hoti hai kaafi frequently. Please doctor, affected area ki image dekhein niche. Mujhe lagta hai ye spicy food khane ki wajah se hota hai. Shayad mujhe kisi cheez se allergy hai par maine abhi tak sahi se samjha nahi hai ki woh kya hai. Main smile ko kuch time se use kar raha hoon. Woh toh kaam karti hai par kaafi dhire dhire. Main yeh nahi samajh pa raha hoon ki ye asli wajah kya hai. Kya yeh meri lifestyle ki wajah se hai? Yeh woh sachai hai jo mujhe samajhni hai. Kripya ismein meri madad karein. Meri madad karein ki yeh asli wajah kya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the underlying cause of frequent mouth ulcers in a software engineer experiencing allergic reactions to spicy food? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. One giant circular patch of ulcer at the lower lip's inner section towards right side. Redness and swelling around the patch.

Hinglish_Question:
Itchy rash , first thought it was bug bites since we had gone camping in NY. Appeared on legs and arms first, starts as red raised spot (liek bite) but when you scratch it, more reddish bumps appear, sometimes intensely itchy, more at night, keeps me from sleeping. Also the rash comes and goes, I tried anti itch cream and it gets better but then will appear soemwhere else. Anytime a clothing seam pressea into skin, little itchy bumps appear along it, then it spreads when you scratch it. Started on upper arms, lower legs, then on thigs, and then started appearing in groin area and between thigs. It also caused bruising on my thigs, and i haven t scratched THAT much. What can cause this.The image for that is attached  below 


Itchy rash, pehle toh laga ki yeh khatmal ke kaatne ki wajah se hai kyun ki hum NY mein camping gaye the. Phele legs and arms par dikhaya, red raised spot (bite jaise) se shuru hota hai, lekin jab aap isko scratch karte hain, toh aur reddish bumps appear, kabhi kabhi bahut jyada itchy hote hain, raat mein aur jyada, sone se rokte hai. Iske alawa ye rash aate jaate rehte hain, maine anti itch cream try ki thi toh thoda better ho gaya tha lekin phir khoi aur jagah par aa gaya. Jab bhi kapde ki seam skin par press hoti hai, toh uske saath saath chote chote itchy bumps uss jagah par appear hote hain, aur jab aap isko scratch karte hain, phir ye spread hota hai. Upper arms and lower legs se shuru hua, phir thighs par bhi hua, aur fir groin area aur thighs ke beech mein bhi dikhne laga hai. Isne mere thighs par bhi bruising ki hai, aur maine waise bahut zyada scratch nahi kiya hai. Iska kya karan ho sakta hai. Uske liye wala image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What might be the cause of a recurring itchy rash on the arms, legs, groin area, and between thighs that spreads when scratched and causes bruising? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere kuch saal pehle ek car accident hua tha aur abhi bhi mere arm mein nerve damage hai, jo shayad normal hai. Par mere paas ek chinta hai, mere forearm ka outer part par ek soft mass hai. Wo thoda spongy hai lekin 1/2 medium egg ke size ka bahar nikla hua hai. Doctor, uske liye image attached hai nichedekhiyen. Hamesha us jagah ko touch karne par dard nahi hota, lekin aaj wo hiper-sensitive hai, sirf finger se chhune par bhi lump mein localized pain hoti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a soft, squishy mass on the outer part of the forearm with hypersensitivity and localized pain? The image shows the condition of hand lump. A patch of skin on the wrist swollen not too big in vertical height but widespread, red in color.

Hinglish_Question: Mene ek purane shed mein jahaan saaf kar raha tha, ek rujh se nail par kakhe gira, nail mere jutte se guzar gaya aur mere paer ke neeche se chhed kar gaya, mene nail nikal liya, mera paer thoda sa suj gaya hai aur chalne par dard hota hai.Please doctor, neeche affected area ki image dekhe. Mera last tetness shot kareeb 5 saal pehle liya tha. Kya ye kuch hai jise mein ghar par treat kar sakte hain ya mujhe urgent medical treatment ki zaroorat hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a patient with foot puncture wound, slight swelling, tenderness, and an outdated tetanus shot seek urgent medical treatment? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Lower lip's right part swollen with a thick dark red line appearing below and above the same part with dryness.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mein 17 saal ki ladki hoon. Mere baal 2 saal se gir rahe hain aur ye rokne ka koi asar nahi ho raha hai. Mene apna hormonal test karwaya tha aur sab kuch normal hai. Mere scalp mein dard hai aur kabhi-kabhi ponytail bhi nahi bana sakti. Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai. Mere scalp ko ek ya do din baad hi oily feel hota hai lekin baal bahut dry aur patle hai. main acchi diet par hoon, mujhe kya karna chahiye?
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing my persistent hair loss, oily scalp, dry and thin hair, scalp pain, despite normal hormonal tests? The image shows the condition of dry scalp. Red lesions on the skin of the scalp with dry skin andsilvery-white scales. Condition- Scalp psoriasis

Hinglish_Question: Last Thursday mere tooth number 14 molar par ek Upper crown prep hua tha, jaise hi injection diya gaya mujhe lag raha tha ki injection site par ek golf ball size ka sujan hai, main suj gaya aur ab major bruising hai aur uncomfortable feel ho rahi hai, crown prep se nahi, injection se, sujan aankh tak ho gayi hai. Please doctor dekhiye eyes ko neeche. Kya needle ne maxillary artery ko nick kar diya ho sakta hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Could a golf ball-sized swelling and major bruising after an upper crown prep be due to a nicked maxillary artery during injection? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Big patch of area around the lower side of the eye is swollen. Light pinkish color and little shiny.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 8 mahine ke beti ko kuch din pehle 39.1C ka temperature tha. Humne use humare doctor ke paas le gaye..unhone diagnosis kiya ki ye ek virus hai. Uska temperature ab normal ho gaya hai lekin uske pure badan par laal spots/rash hain. Agar wo kuch der ek taraf se soti hai toh uski face par rash zyada dikhte hain.Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Main ye nahi jaan paa rahi hoon ki rash virus ka ek hissa hai ya paracetamol ki allergy ka reaction hai. Koi sujhaav ho toh bataiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the red spots/rash all over an 8-month-old's body, following a recent fever and doctor-diagnosed virus? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Little red pinkish dots on the hands of the baby.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 3 din se pure sharir par red rash ho raha hai, skin sirf red ho gayi hai, koi bumps ya raised skin nahi hai. Ye khujli aur garmi wala hai, pin pricks aise lagte hain jaise pure sharir ko needle se chubhaya ja raha ho. Saath hi mujhe headache, thand aur pure sharir mein dard bhi hai, especially meri kamar mein. Koi bukhar nahi hai. Uski image neeche attached hai. Please check the current condition.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of a red rash without bumps, accompanied by itching, heat sensation, pin pricks, headache, chills, and body aches? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere aankhon ke palak mein floating fluid filled some issue hai. Doctor, kripya patient ki aankhon ki image \ko neeche dekhein. Vo size ek chhote matar ke saman hai. Muhase ki taraf hone wale kone mein ek gaanth hai, jo mehsoos hoti hai aur hil sakti hai. Mainne ice area par lagayi hai, par koi badlaav nahi. Dard nahi hai, lalima nahi hai. Note karein ki hamesha se hi mujhe us area mein ek chhota aur hilne wala gaanth hai, aur ab vo badi ho gayi hai. Mujhe kya karna chahiye?
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a newly enlarged, painless, fluid-filled swelling on the eyelid that can be moved and doesn't respond to ice? The image here shows the condition of swollen eye

Hinglish_Question:
Fungal skin condition, kabhi-kabhi faint red patches of skin jate hai mostly wo areas mein jaha pe main sabse zyada pasina karta hoon, lekin sare jism pe bhi ho sakte hain, kabhi-kabhi toh itne halkisme visible hote hain lekin hamesha itchy hote hain. Waqt ke saath badh gaya hai. Kabhi-kabhi itna kharoch leta hoon apni skin ko ki pata hi nahi chalta. Mere chehre, haatho, ghutno, kaan aur gaand ke cheeks ke alawa poore jism pe hai. Sabse zyada severe hai breast ke neeche, andar aur bahar ki kohni, chuhon wali jagah, gardan, sar, peeth, aur especially legs. Kabhi-kabhi khoon tak khujalata hoon, kabhi-kabhi zarurat padti hai ki mujhe pata chale ki yeh kya hai!!! Kripya madad karein. 
![Image](path_to_image)
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause behind the patient's itchy, worsening fungal skin condition with red patches and bleeding when scratched? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, main 21 saal ki hu, female. Mere chehre ki skin me white patches mixed hai aur face par blackheads hai. Maine bahut saare soaps use kiye hai, koi bhi meri skin type ke liye suitable nahi hai. Meri skin dry hai. Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai, lekin kabhi kabhi meri skin face par oily dikhti hai. Internet mein refer kiya tha aur maine dove soap use kiya, lekin mujhe aur jyada dry kar diya. Main antifungal talc use kar rahi hu rashes ko treat karne ke liye. Kya aap meri skin type ke liye ek achha soap suggest kar sakte hain?
multimodal_Question_summ: What soap can be suggested for a 21-year-old female with white patches, blackheads, dry and occasionally oily skin? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. Dryskin with small peels of skin coming out.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, main ek company mein kaam karti hoon, jahan ek vyakti diabetes se suffer karta hai. Usko regular insulin ke injections use karte hai. Well, jab maine trash can uthaya to dhyaan nahi diya aur wo gir gaya, aur maine ek istemal kiya hua sujan chhuna. Mujhe pata hai ki mujhe chhed nahi pada kyunki wo meri skin ko nahi kaat payi. Us jagah par maine dabaav bhi dala aur koi khoon nahi nikla. Do din baad hi mujhe bimaar ho gaya. Mere paas sardi hai aur mujhe dar hai ki kya yeh ghatna se sambandhit hai. Main ye sure karna chahti hoon ki mere sharir mein koi bhi virus (jaise HIV) nahi hai. Mujhe bas assurance chahiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it possible to contract HIV or other viruses from touching a needle, experiencing a cold, and having a skin rash? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mera boyfriend aur main pehle bahar the aur mujhe yaqeen nahi hai ki kuch ne use kat liya ya fir chhed diya, lekin kuch hua hai. Uske pair ke upar ek bump hai aur use bahut dard aur sujan ho rahi hai. Doctor, aap patient ki legs ki kuch samasya ko dekh sakte hain below. Koi idea hai ki ye kya ho sakta hai ya kya madad kar sakti hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: What might be the cause of the severe pain, swelling, and bump on the top of the patient's foot after a possible bite or stab? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The right foot is swollen with some deformation.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe pichle hafta ke Wednesday, Thursday, aur Friday ko bukhar tha aur bahut zyada sarir dard hua (sara badan mein). Monday ko mere gala se mere ghutne tak ek daag aa gaya hai. Ye skin ke neeche motling ki tarah dikhta hai. Mere gale, kaan ke piche, aur right kangan mein mera lymph node sujha hua hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Friday se bukhar ya dard nahi hai. Kya mujhe doctor ke paas follow up karna chahiye?
multimodal_Question_summ: Is it necessary to consult a doctor when experiencing fever, body pain, rash, swollen lymph nodes, and swollen tonsils? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils turned red with inflammation.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe bacterial pink eye ka diagnosis Monday ko hua hai (symptoms Sunday se shuru hue). Sujan jyada badh rahi hai, aur ansoo bhi jyada hai. Mera gaal, mere aankh ke niche aur kan ke pass, sabhi suj gaye hain. Please doctor, aankhein niche dekhein. Kya mujhe is baat ki chinta karni chahiye, ya yeh sirf theek hone ka process hai. (Main Yigamox har teen ghante mein le raha hoon).
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient worry about worsening swelling, tearing, and swollen cheek/eye/ear in bacterial pink eye treatment? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Entire under-eye part swelling present with light pink coloration.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor. Meri bachhi 11 mahine ki hai. Pichle 2 mahino se uske right hand par rashes ho rahe hain. Unki size chhoti hai, red aur thoda suj gayi hui hai aur cluster mein hain. Please doctor, vartaman condition ko dekhein. Bachhe ko koi khujli ya irritation nahi ho rahi hai, kya betnesol oral advisable hai. Iska karan kya ho sakta hai.

Little dryness present.

Hinglish_Question: Mera haalchal, maine kal kuch mdma li thi aur aaj mere haath mein thoda swelling hai, red skin hai, forehead par bumps hai aur lips suj gaye hain. Mujhe ye janna hai ki kya mujhe allergy hai aur kya ye side effects samay ke saath kam ho jayenge ya mujhe treatment ki jaroorat hai. Iski image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is swelling in hand, red skin, forehead bumps, and swollen lips after taking MDMA an allergic reaction needing treatment? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Oval shaped swelling the on the palm side of hand below the middle finger.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe lagbhag 3 hafte pehle clindamycin se allergic reaction ho gaya tha. Mere pure sharir par 10 din tak rash tha. Maine apne PCP ke paas do baar jaake, steroid shot bhi liya, lekin meri mouth ki upar wali jagah abhi bhi dard ho raha hai, mere hotho mein thoda sa sujan hai (aati jaati rehti hai), meri hotho aur jibh mein jalan aur khujli ho rahi hai.Please doctor dekhiye is vartaman condition ko . Main apne dentist aur ENT doctor ke paas gaya hu, lekin koi bhi meri mouth ki samasya ka solution nahi find kar pa raha hai. ENT doctor ne kaha ki ye allergic reaction ke lingering effect ho sakta hai. Koi sujhav hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient experienced a full body rash from clindamycin allergy, followed by soreness and swelling in mouth. Seeking suggestions for treatment. The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Upper lip's left part is swollen with little redness.

Hinglish_Question: Mere upper lips ke right side mein ek chota sa chhed hai (agar aap apni jeebh ko gum aur lips ke beech as far as possible push karein) aur mujhe isse lagbhag 3 din se hai. Chhed ke aas paas laal aur suj gaya hai aur chhed ko chhu lene par dard hota hai aur jab koi liquid ya khana use chhed par touch karta hai tab jalan hoti hai. Kripya doctor, affected area ki image below dekhein. Ye kya ho sakta hai, kya mujhe chinta karne ki zaroorat hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the small hole in the upper lip, redness, swelling, and pain when touched or exposed to liquids/food? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Full upper lip swollen. More swelling on right side of upper lip.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 8 saal ke damad ne seedhe aankho ke beech me maara hua hai (wo hamare 70 pound ke kutte ke sir se takra gaya). Usko ab waha pe sujhan hai, jiska size ek quarter se thoda bada hai aur us sujhan ke beech mein ek laal chot hai. Jabki waha ka hissa sakht hona tha, wah squishy hai jaise chot ke niche pani ho. Usko sar dard ya ulti ki feeling nahi hai. Wo chal sakta hai aur padh sakta hai aur sawalon ka jawab bhi sahi deta hai. Uske naak ke bridge pe dard hai aur sujhan wala hissa bahut hi sensitive hai. Please doctor, dekhiye yeh aankhein neeche ki taraf hai. Kya mujhe is baat se chinta karni chahiye? Wo desh se aa raha hai aur mujhe kuch samajh nahi aa raha hai ki kya karu. Aapke samay ke liye dhanyavaad. Vivie.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is a swollen, squishy area with a red bruise between the eyes, along with pain and tenderness, concerning for an 8-year-old boy? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Big swelling of the entire eyelid and also below the eye. Looks Dark red and little shiny.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe kuch muh mein problem ho rahi hai. Mera lower lip ke andar ki taraf sujan aur dard hai...upper lip par bhi chota sa suj gaya hai jo jalan karta hai. Aaj kal thik ho rahe hain, par front gums suje hue hain, aur brush karte waqt dard karte hain. Teeth kafi recent me clean karwaye hai...mai har 6 mahine me jaata hoon. Please doctor, dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Yeh ek nayi cheez hai ki maine tooth paste ki bajaye ek all natural powder use karna shuru kiya tha...wo maine kal se band kar diya hai. Mujhe yaad nahi ki mujhe last kab bimari hui thi! Lag raha hai ki ye viral hai aur mujhe nahi pata ki mujhe ye kaise lag raha hai... Thanks bahut!
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of swollen, sore spots on the inner edge of the lower and upper lips, swollen and painful front gums? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Bright pink coloured skin with darkening at one place on inner side of lower lip.

Hinglish_Question: Meri gaanth mein dard hai.Mera thigh par ek what I think is a spider bite hai. Ek red ring hai, 1.5 inches diameter ka. Iska center raised and hard hai aur beech mein white speck dikhai deta hai. Kuch din se hai aur touch karne par dard hota hai aur thoda sa sore bhi hai. Aapko kya lagta hai ye kya ho sakta hai. Image iske liye attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the red, raised, and painful skin rash with a white speck a spider bite on the thigh? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hi. Mujhe last 5 saal se mere left breast ke neeche ek skin tag hai. Isne saalon mein thoda badhna shuru kar diya hai lekin koi badi problem nahi hai. Kuch din pehle maine notice kiya hai ki isne aur badhna shuru kiya hai aur ab uski bottom ek wart jaisi hard type hogayi hai aur top blackish color ki hai.Please see the image of patient skin  below. Kabhi kabhi iska maas nikal jata hai aur touch karne par dard hota hai, bas irritation se zyada sore feel hota hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Summary: Patient has a skin tag under left breast for 5 years, recently it has grown with a blackish top, rawness, and occasional pain. The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. There are black coloured rough surfaced mass elevated from the surface of the skin.

Hinglish_Question: Mere paas 7 saal ka beta hai jiska history dry skin ka hai aur usko frequently eczema-like rashes ho jate hain. Do saalon se lagatar is samay par uske pairo ke bahar, ghoono ke upar aur kalaiyon ke piche ek rash ho jata hai. Wo rash uske elbows par sabse zyada kharab hota hai. Wo kinda like pimples lagte hain, red and itchy hai. Uska image niche attached kiya gaya hai . maine kal raat se hydrocortisone cream lagana shuru kiya hai aur wo ab thoda better lag rahe hain, redness kam ho gayi hai. Pichle saal doctor ne use scabies diagnose kiya tha, lekin mujhe really lagta nahi hai ki wohi hai. Kuch ideas hai kya?
multimodal_Question_summ: Does a 7 yr old boy's rash on elbows, knees, and wrists resembling pimples and responding to hydrocortisone cream indicate scabies? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Patches of pink bean shaped skin, little raised all over the leg.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, teen saal pehle, mere sar mein dard aur sar ka sunn hona kuch dinon tak tha. Maine ek doctor se salah li aur ek thyroid test karaya. Tab mere TSH level 3.7 tha aur usne mujhe Thyronorm 25 mcg likha. Unhone kaha jab tak mera TSH level 1.5 pe na aa jaye, tab tak ise band na karun. Ab, karib 11 mahino se mujhe sharir mein dard, hath ka sunn hona, sukha aur khujli wala twacha, please see the current condition below, baal jhadna, gardan aur hatho par khujli wagarah, aur motion ki samasya hai. Mere recent thyroid report mein TSH - 4.58, total T4 - 7.50 aur total T3 - 0.91 hai. Inke alawa saare blood aur scan reports normal hai. Mere left side ki pith mein bhi dard hai. Lekin, doctor ab bhi kehte hai ki thyroid ke result normal hai. Meri madad karein, please.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of body pain, hand numbness, dry and itchy skin, hair fall, rashes, bowel issues, and back pain, with normal test results? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. The skin of the upper eyelid has turn white and coming out.

Hinglish_Question: Doctor, meri legs suj gayi hain aur mujhe takleef ho rahi hai. Sujan lagatar bani hui hai aur mujhe chalne mein ya aaram nahi mil raha hai. Maine various remedies try kiye hain, lekin kuch kaam nahi kar raha hai. Mujhe underlying cause ki chinta hai aur aapki expertise mein is problem ko diagnose aur treat karne mein madad chahiye. Kripya dekhein, image attached below.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the underlying cause of persistent leg swelling causing discomfort and difficulty in walking? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The ankle of the foot is swollen with brown discolouration.

Hinglish_Question: Mere husband ko Oct. 2009 mein lung cancer ka diagnosis hua tha, ct scan mein bohot saare masse the. Unhone kaha tha ki unhe lagbhag 8 se 12 mahine zinda rehna hai.Jan. 2010 mein unhe hospital mein virus ke wajah se rakh liya gaya tha. Unhone ek aur CT scan karaya aur kaha ki cancer gayab ho gaya hai. Unhe iske baare mein baat karna pasand nahi tha. Baad mein maine pucha ki unki lungs mein kya tha. Unhone claim kiya ki shayad wo mere skin mein koi abnormality thi jo unhone dekhi thi, jab pehle maine pucha tha ki kya ye ho sakta hai toh unhone kaha tha nahi.Abhi unke diet mein bahut zyada yogurt add kiya hai aur unhone itching ko rok diya hai jo unhe bohot badi pareshaani de rahi thi aur unke skin par growths aa rahe hain jo gir rahi hai.Please doctor, neeche di gayi vartaman condition dekhe. Kya ye aspergillus ka kaaran aur iski healing ho sakti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the skin growths and itching be caused by aspergillus and could the addition of yogurt be aiding in healing? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. There is brown mass elevated from the surface on the skin.

Hinglish_Question: Main do hafte pehle gir gaya tha,apne right knee ko bruise kiya,ab bhi dard ho raha hai aur mere knee ke right hand side par lump hai,Doctor kripya niche di gayi image par dekhe (shin bone ke bahut upar) jo bahar ki taraf jhuk raha hai, chalne ya ghutne par dard ho raha hai, kya aap mujhe diagnosis mein madad kar sakte hain. Dhanyavad.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a painful lump on the right side of the knee after a recent fall? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. The right leg have swollen with a slight deformation in the leg.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe Lympingitis ka diagnose hua hai aur mujhe hospital se 15 din pahle release kiya gaya tha. Mere paas oral antibiotics samapt ho gaye the aur mere ungli mein infection ho gaya tha ek chote se sliver se. Mujhe kuch aur antibiotics Doxycycline diye gaye aur maine unko 6 din se le raha hoon. Ungli ab itne suj gayi hai ki sujane ka aur ho hi nahi sakta.Kripya doctor, dekhiye mera haath mein kuch ho gaya hai. Upar waale knuckle, middle knuckle aur haath ke pass waale knuckle bahut laal aur suj gaye hain, aaj ki sujhan meri kalai ke taraf shuru ho rahi hai. Bahut dard ho raha hai unme. Mere gale mein ek laal mokh infected lympnode bhi hai. Mere bayee bade toe mein choti si cut se infection ho gaya hai aur sirf tip tak suj gaya hai. Mere right foot mein do ungliyon ke beech sujhan aur infection ho gaya hai wahaan jahaan par mere skin chapped thi. Antibiotics aur soaking bilkul help nahi kar raha hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere 60 saal hai, wazan 44 kg hai, height 5.6 hai, diabetes past 25 saal se hai, 80 din se low carbohydrate diet par hoon, ab diabetes ke liye koi dawa nahi le raha hoon. Kidney function test, liver function test, 2D echo, thyroid test, HbA1C, lipid profile, stool examination, B12 tests ho chuke hain. Local doctor se mila hoon aur unho ne kaha hai ki yeh nutritional pedal ya malabsorption hai. Diye gaye medicine hai. Oroalbumen powder tino waqt 30 din tak. Revidox LB din mein do baar, paanch din tak. Lasilactone 25 mg subah mein ek baar, teen din tak. Upar se Thyronorm 25 mcg, Vitamin C, multivitamin tablet, Omega 3 fish oil, Ecosprin 75 bhi le raha hoon. Teen din hogaye hai, kafi jyaada sudhar nahi dikha. Vitamin B12 ka level 1271 hai. Meri sawal hai ki kyun Vitamin B12 high hai. Kya yeh small intestine bacterial overgrowth ho sakta hai. Bohot saare protein aur healthy food le raha hoon, par koi fayda nahi ho ra hai. Kripya madad karein takishochewabsorbed ho sake.

Meri BMI ki ek idea dene ke liye, meri height 5'2" hai. Problem ye hai ki surgery ke baad se 21 din ho gaye hain aur mere surgeon dwara rakhe gaye ek drain abhi bhi fluid drain kar raha hai. Ye fluid poore surgery ke 7 din ke baad se drain hona shuru hua hai aur ye mere right thigh ke peeche ka hissa hai. Ye surgery ke baad se third drain hai lekin do drains pehle hi band ho chuke hain. Main abhi bhi poore body mein swelling hai aur normal tarike se chalne mein thodi dikkat ho rahi hai. Meri city mein lockdown hai isliye mujhe apne surgeon se milne aur post-op care ke liye nahi ja sakti, lekin unhone bola hai ki koi bhi general surgeon meri help kar sakta hai toh maine apne shehar ke general surgeon se consult kiya aur unhone kaha sab thik hai. Aur mujhe mere left thigh pe skin necrosis bhi hai. Mujhe nahi pata main kya karu. Online padha hai ki surgery ke 21 din ke baad most of the patients theek ho jate hain aur yahaan tak main abhi bhi drain kar rahi hoon, apne poore roop se theek hone ke liye kahin tarike se nahi pahunchi hoon.

Ye kharish mujhe august se hai, shuruaat mein stan ke nichle hisse mein thi, tab ye khujli nahi karti thi lekin lagbhag ek mahine baad ye failne lagi aur ab mujhe kuch samajh nahi aa raha hai. Three days after my return home, I came down with another bout of cellulitis. My skin appears to be in good condition. Could flying be involved in causing this condidtion. Thank you.

 May ke end tak, mai 5 din ke trip se NYC se wapis aaya, Tampa se NY mei udne ke dwara. Mere dono pairo mei lymp hai aur do din baad hi mere wapis aane ke. Kripya doctor dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Mai ne 12 din ke liye Keflex liya. Fir June ke end tak, mai Evanston, IL mei 2 din ke conference ke liye aur phir Toledo mei mere parents se milne ke liye 4 din ke liye travel kiya. Mere ghar lautne ke teen din baad, mujhe dusri baar cellulitis ka attack hua. Mere skin ki condition acchi lagti hai. Kya udne ka is bimari mei koi hissa ho sakta hai? Dhanyavaad.

Hinglish_Question: Kya iska koi kharcha hota hai? Meri beti, jo ab 6 saal ki hai, usko pichle November mein septic hip thi. Usko granuloma se problem thi jo nahi jaane aur infect ho gaya tha. Unhone surgery ek mahine pehle hi dobara karwayi thi. Jab wo pehli baar hospital mein thi, uski sed rate 34 thi. Fir wo kam huyi aur uske tonsils ko kal nikal diya gaya. Maine pichle hafte doctor se poocha tha jab unhone uski blood ko le rahe the ki uski sed rate phir se check kar le. Normally wo nahi karte, lekin maine surakshit rakhne ke liye dubaara confirm karwana chahiye socha. Wo mujhe kal surgery ke baad bataya hai ki uski sed rate wapas 30 ho gayi hai. Kya mujhe chinta honi chahiye? Wo swasth dikh rahi hai lekin usko andheri aankhein, laalima aur ajeeb si skin problems hai uske septic hip se pehle se. Kripya doctor, neeche di gayi aankhon ko dekhein. Unhone use ek baar leukemia ke liye test kiya tha aur medical specialist ki raay leni padi thi kyunki uski rates high thi lekin bahut zyada nahi thi. Mere lakshanon me shamil hai: Behad dardakar sar dard, peeth ke peeche stiffness, bahut bura naak bandhon hona jo lagbhag ek hafte se ho raha hai, aur baaki sab lakshan to bas pichle din hi develop hue hain, naak ke andar ki bandish bahut gehri hai aur main ise sirf apne naak ko saaf karke dur nahi kar sakti, aur pura din mera muh saans lene me ek dam mucus se bhar gaya hai...bahut ganda, jab bhi main ise cough karta hoon to woh green hota hai, halka sa khansi hai, kuch serious nahi hai, meri aankhen paani bahar aati hain aur sooji hui hoti hain, aur mere shareer me dard hota hai, aur mujhe 2 din se kabhi kabhi thand lagti hai, aur mera tapmaan 100 ke aaspass hi rehta hai. Hinglish_Question: Mere pyare doctor, mujhe mere swasthya samasyao ke bare mein kuch sawal puchne hain. 25 mahine tak bina suraksha ke hone ke baad, maine HIV test karwaya hai, jiska naam comb AIDS test hai, aur uska result HIV-1 aur HIV-2 dono ke liye negative aaya hai. Usi samay, maine HBsAg ka test bhi liya hai. Uska image neeche attach hai. HVC, scrub typhus, Widal test aur blood sugar ka test bhi liya hai, lekin sabhi ke result negative aaye hain. Teen mahine baad maine firse comb AIDS test karwaya, lekin is baar bhi result negative aaya. Khush nahi hua, isliye HIV ELISA test ke liye gaya, lekin is baar bhi result negative aaya. Lekin abhi mujhe kai samasyao ka samna karna pad raha hai, jaise ki atyadhik thakan, muh aur jibh mein chale, kamjori, peeth ke piche lal dhabbe, baar baar pyas, baar baar urine, urine ka tez gandh, kabhi kabhi khujli aur daag private parts mein, kabhi kabhi kaan mein dard, khujli aur lal aankhein, baat karne ki energy nahi hai, aasani se sardi ho jana aur band naak se chink aana. Haalhi mein mujhe malaria hua tha aur dawa lene ke baad main theek ho gaya. Kya yeh sambhav hai ki meri immune system 25 mahine ke unprotected sex ke baad antibody ko pehchanne ke liye bahut kamzor ho gayi thi? HIV AIDS hone ke liye kitna samay lagta hai? Kya yeh sambhav hai ki main HIV ke antim charan mein hoon jiski wajah se HIV tests ne false negative result diya hai? Kya koi aur HIV test hai jo meri HIV sthiti ke bare mein 100% result dega? Kuch log mujhe CD4 count aur PCR RNA ke liye jane ki salah dete hain. Kya mujhe woh test karwane ki zarurat hai? Mujhe jo samasyayein hai, unka sambhav karan kya hai? Ant mein, main aapse vinamrata se anurodh karta hoon ki mere sawalo ka dhyan se jawab de aur meri samasyao ko vyavasthit tarike se samjhe. Aapki meherbani hogi. Dhanyavad.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of extreme tiredness, mouth ulcers, weakness, and other symptoms experienced after negative HIV test results? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Lump on the wrist's bone on the right hand.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, mere paas ek toddler hai jo ek saal aur 6 mahine ka hai. Kal maine dekha ki uska ek aankh bahut laal tha aur aaj subah jab hum uth gaye, maine dekha ki woh suj gayi hai. Kal raat usne mushkil se soya tha aur raat bhar apni aankh ragad raha tha. Mujhe yeh pata nahi ki iska karan kya ho sakta hai, kya aapko ho sakta hai ki iska karan kya hai? Kripya doctor, mere aankh ko neeche dekhein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of redness, swelling, and sleep disturbance in a 1-year-old toddler's eye? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has started to become red from canthus.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, main M30 hoon. Mere pairon ke anguthe par mere skin mein kuchh samasya hai. (Mujhe technical terms mein achhe se nahi pata hai). Skin choti choti chot jaisi jagahon par bahut itchy/ pricky ho jati hai aur saaf pani bahar aata hai aur upar rehta hai. Mujhe kisi bhi food substance se allergy nahi hai. Meri mom ke saath bhi aise hi problem thi aur doctor ne hame pehle (10 saal pehle) Propygenta aur Liquid paraffin IP diya tha jisse ki rashes bahut kam ho gaye the (lagbhag 95% cured) 5-6 hafte istemaal karne ke baad. Jis tarah se doctor ne samjhaya tha, ye kisi tarah ki kamzori ki wajah se hota hai. Mujhe Cobadex Vitamin B12 capsule aur cetrizet supplement ke taur par diya gaya tha. Bahut time ke baad, abhi rashes thode se shuru ho gaye hai lekin bahut itchy hai jaise pehle. Kya main propygenta cream istemaal kar sakta hoon. Aisa lagta hai ki general medical stores mein available nahi hai. Kya koi equivalent medicine hai. Uska image neeche attach kiya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the equivalent medicine to Propygenta cream for itchy and oozing skin rashes on the feet toes? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 18 mahine ke bacche ke hotho pe sujan hai aur upper lip bhi thodi suj gayi hai. Uska munh dard hota hai aur wo khana khane ki koshish karta hai lekin sirf ek bite leta hai aur kehta hai ow aur phir aur nahi khata. Humne use dentist ke paas le gaye the aur use amoxicillin ka rx diya gaya lekin wo sujan ka kaaran nahi samajh paaye the.Kripya dekhein is affected area ki image doctorke neeche.Duse thoda halka bukhar hai aur hum use dard aur sujan ke liye advil de rahe hain. Aaj raat mujhe bhi notice hua hai ki uske jeebh pe kuch chhote chhote laal dhabbe hain, jaise ki usne kuch kadva khaya ho jo uske taste buds ko irritate kar rahe hain. Uske haath aur pair laal nahi hai, maine check kiya tha kahin ye hand, foot aur mouth disease to nahi hai. Oh aur wo raat ko achhe tarah se nahi sota hai, wo har couple hours mein uth jata hai lekin din bhar wo bahut active hai. Kya aapko koi idea hai ki mere chhote bachhe mein kya problem hai. Dhanyavaad!!
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of swollen tonsils, upper lip swelling, mouth pain, reduced appetite, mild fever, tongue spots, and disrupted sleep in an 18-month-old? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils have swollen excessively in the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Mere dono underarms garam hai aur halka sa tingling sensation hai. Mujhe gale mein sujaya hua lymph nodes aur glands the, sore throat bhi tha. Please dekhein is affected area ko below on OCT 1. Maine 10 din tak Amox/K Clav 875 125 mg liya. Mere gale ki problem kam hui hai aur throat clear hai according to PA. Ab, tingling sensation aur garam underarms kyun hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can swollen tonsils, lymph nodes, and glands in the neck be related to tingling and warm armpits after taking Amoxicillin? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. One of the tonsils are swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, Mere daayin paon ke dusre ungli mein dard hai. Koi sujan, neele ya kale rang ka nahi hai. Chalne ya kuch karne par dard nahi hota. Sirf jab dabaya jata hai tab dard hota hai. For example, jab main apne ghutno par baithna padta hai toh jamin par dabane par us ungli mein tez dard hota hai. Mujhe nahi pata ki ye kya hai. Uski tasveer neeche hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of sharp pain in the second toe of the right foot when pressure is applied? The image here shows the condition of foot swelling

Hinglish_Question: Hi, meri 3 saal ke chote bacche ke face, eyes, ears aur nose suj gaye hain aur uske pas ek red rash bhi hai jo raised hai. Please doctor, dekhiye neeche di gayi aankhein. Ye cheez raat ko shuru hui, hum usko hospital le gaye aur unhone kaha ki ye ek reaction hai, abhi bhi ho rahi hai lekin bas jab wo so raha hota hai.
multimodal_Question_summ:
What could be the cause of a 3-year-old boy's swollen face, eyes, ears, and nose, along with a raised, red rash? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Swelling of the left eye lid with dark pink coloured skin over the swelling having shiny appearance. 
Condition- stye.

Hinglish_Question: Mera beta 5 mahine ka hai, uske skin mein kuch problem hai, jiski wajah se wo eczema hai, aur abhi usko fever ho raha hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Hum abhi bamc se nikle hain, jahan usne blood and urine cultures karwaye the. Uske wbc ke baare mein jo result aya hai, wo high hai aur uski thigh mein ek shot lagane ki zaroorat hai, iska matlab kya hota hai.
multimodal_Question_summ:
What does a high white blood cell count and needing a shot in the thigh mean for a 5-month-old with eczema and fever? The image shows the condition of skin irritation. Pink coloured rash with silvery scales over the rash.
Condition- Psoriasis

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe ek bumpy itchy rash hai jo mere forhead par shuru hua hai aur mere chehre ke sides, jawline aur under my chin tak fail gaya hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe hilate hue 2 weeks ho gaye hain gallbladder surgery (2 weeks ago) se, aur mujhe ye soch rahi hoon ki kya ye iske wajah se ho raha hai ya kuch aur. Normally, meri skin bahut smooth hoti hai aur mujhe compliment kiya jata hai ki kitni clear hai. Please help.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the bumpy, itchy rash spreading from the forehead to the jawline and under the chin be related to recent gallbladder surgery? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, meri gums mein ek abscess hai. Mein kal hospital gaya tha aur unhone mujhe daily char baar leni wali 500 mg Penicillin ki dawai recommend ki thi. Mein ne kal subah 10 baje Penicillin lena shuru kiya. Abscess ki wajah se mera chehra suj gaya hai. Raat bhar ke samay sujan meri aankh ke aas pass phail gayi hai. Mere gaal ko sahlane tak mujhe koi dard nahi hai. Aankh se abhi tak mujhe dikhayi de raha hai, lekin ye uncomfortable hai. Lekin, aankh ke aas pass sujan hone se mujhe bahut dar lag raha hai aur mein ye jaanna chahta hoon ki kya mujhe phir se hospital jana chahiye aur IV antibiotic ke baare mein pata lagana chahiye ya phir mein oral antibiotic ke saath hi intezaar karoon? Iske liye waha ki image attachment mein di gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient return to the hospital for an IV antibiotic, considering the abscess-induced swelling around the eye? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Little swelling on the lateral side of the right eye's eyelid.

Hinglish_Question: Main ek 25 saal ka ladka hoon, Hyderabad mein software engineer ke roop mein kaam karta hoon. Kuch samasya hai mere muh mein jo ki mere muh ke andar ke hisso mein char din se ho rahi hai. Mujhe yaad hai ki is problem ke hone se ek raat pehle main bahar khana khaya tha. Abhi ulcer inner cheeks mein hai aur yahi samasya zuban ke saath bhi hai. Palatal bhi pareshan lag raha hai.Please doctor, affected area ki image dekhein jo neeche hai. Agar main kuch spicy khata hoon toh tez jalne wala sensation hota hai. Maine suna hai ki ye vitamin ki kami se bhi ho sakta hai. Kripya mujhe bataye ki kya aapko aur details chahiye. Regards
multimodal_Question_summ: Male software engineer, 25, experiencing mouth ulcers, burning sensation, and vitamin deficiency possibility. Image provided. What is the diagnosis? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. A patch of oval shaped swelling on the tongue's right side. Dark red in color with swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 5 saal ki beti ko hives ho rahe hain aur aisa lag raha hai ki uske tonsils suj gaye hain, har ek par ek chhota sa white spot hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Usko koi sore throat ki shikayat nahi hai aur na hi usko fever hai, lekin usko school se do din se hives ki wajah se ghar bhej dia gaya hai, aur aaj kal harder hai compared to yesterday. Kya hives aur tonsils se related hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the sudden onset of hives in a 5-year-old girl related to her swollen tonsils, without symptoms of sore throat or fever? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils have swollen excessively in the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe December se khujli ho rahi hai. Mujhe laga ki ye aam sardiyo ke samay ki sukhi twacha hai, isliye maine ise sehatmand banaye rakha aur extra lotions use kiye. Fir February mein mere pair par ek daane wala rash hua aur fir pure badan mein fail gaya. Mujhe yeh soch rahi hai ki kya mere birth control se ye ho sakta hai. Main ek dermatologist se mila jisne ek biopsy kiya aur result dermatitis contact or atopic aaya hai. Main ek allergist se mila aur yeh pata chala ki mujhe khane se koi allergy nahi hai, bas mausamik allergy hai jise maine apni puri zindagi mein saath nibhaya hai, lekin loratadine ya Zyrtec se control kiya jata hai. Mujhe yeh thoda mushkil hai is baat ko manne mein ki ye dono dawaiyan wajah hai jabki rash jab shuru hue the, tab bhi zameen par barf thi. Mujhe ek mahine tak prednisone ka sevan kiya gaya, lekin koi asli rahat nahi mili. B/c ko lagbhag 14 din ke liye band kar diya aur rash saaf ho gayi, lekin use dobara shuru karne par wapas rash ho gaya. Kya mujhe october ki akhri saptah mein brand badalne par deri se reaction ho raha hai? . Uska image neeche diya gaya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Could the patient's itchy skin and rash be caused by a delayed reaction to a switch in birth control brands? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, Mere pairon par lagbhag 10 ya aise hi chote laal daag dikh rahe hain, aur unke charo taraf safed ghera hai. Please doctor is vartaman condition ko dekhein neeche. Mujhe lagta nahi hai ki yeh khujli ya irritation kar rahe hain, lekin mujhe yeh nahi pata ki iska karan kya hai. Mujhe kuch dino se thoda kam tej bukhar hai, aur halki flu jaisi symptoms bhi hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of the patient's red spots with white halos on their legs accompanied by a low grade fever and flu-like symptoms? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. This is a black mass accumulated on the skin.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, Mera desi doctor, mein bahar gaya tha aur mera pet aur pairon par kuch problem hui hai. Kripya dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Yahan har jagah lal daag hain aur bahut khujli ho rahi hai. Mujhe ye chinta hai ki iska HIV se koi sambandh ho sakta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient has developed itchy skin rashes with red dots on stomach and legs, concerned about possible HIV connection. The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere shoulders, chest aur arms par ek rash ho gaya hai. Vo chote chote laal daag hain aur bahut kharash hoti hai, lekin mujhe yeh nahi pata ki ye kyun ho raha hai. Maine ek naya detergent shuru kiya hai, lekin meri legs mein kharash nahi hai, meri stomach mein bhi nahi, aur mere clean clothes ke saath meri chest ka koi contact bhi nahi hai (maine past two days se v-neck shirts pehni hai, lekin phir bhi rash meri chest aur neck par ho raha hai). Mujhe peanuts se allergy hai, lekin main unse kisi bhi tarah ka contact nahi kiya hai aur meri throat bhi nahi suj rahi hai. Iska kya lag raha hai. Iske liye attached image dekhein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of an itchy red rash on the shoulders, chest, and arms, despite no exposure to peanuts and new detergent use? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere moon ke andar, right hand side of my lower lip par ek painful pea size lump hai. Main apni jeebh se ise idhar udhar move kar sakti hoon. Ye dard karta hai aur pure area ko ache hone ka ehsas kar raha hai. Isi area me aur kuch lumps hai dusri taraf bhi lekin ye ek swollen lag raha hai aur sabse prominent hai. Jab main apne honth ko peeche kheenchti hoon to ise clearly dekh sakte hain... Kripya dekhe, affected area ki image below mein. Koi suggestion hai? Bahut dhanyavaad, Kerrie
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of painful pea size lump on the right side of the lower lip, along with other swollen lumps in the same area? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Lower right side of the lower lip is swollen with slight red patches around the same area. Possible Impact from an object to the lip might have caused the swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Maine 9 saal baad ek hafte pehle smoking chhod di hai, mere haath par rash aane shuru hue, phirback mein aur ab mere chehre par, ye bahut chote-chote dane aur mere chehre par toh woh lal aur bump hota hai. Mujhe aksar bahut saaf aur sukhe skin hoti hai lekin ab mere chehre mein fatmahsoos hoti hai. Kripya doctor is vartaman condition ko dekhe. Kya ye kuch aisa hai jo smoking chhorne ke baad hota hai? Kya mujhe kuch karne ki zarurat hai?
