Is this a common occurrence after quitting smoking, and what can be done for relief? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: My concern hai alag-alag diagnosis: salivary gland infection surgery (coming from my salivary gland but no mucus) aur Acid reflux (coming from my stomach with acid taste). Mein ne bahut zyada acid reflux aur antibiotics pills liye hain, lekin koi asar nahi hua. Kripya doctor, neeche aankhe dekhe . Aur is sediment par chemical analysis nahi hua hai. Meri throat mein dard nahi hai, breath mei smell nahi hai, taste problem hai, mujhe bataya gaya hai ki koi sphincter nahi hai, esophagus ki lining ya larynx damage nahi hai, koi mucus nahi hai, sukhapan nahi hai, no heartburn hai, sediment ke wajah se har 10-15 minute mein sleep problem hai without a CPAP machine, sleep machine ek ya do baar raat mein use karta hoon toh muh ko dhone ke liye jo mujhe lagta hai ki problem mere stomach se aa rahi hai. November 2011 mein jab problem shuru hui thi tab post nasal drip hone ki wajah se antibiotics, nasal spray, ityadi liya tha, aaj: nasal drip nahi hai, lekin phir bhi white stuff hamesha milta hai. Kabhi-kabhi mujhe lagta hai ki mere doctors chote chote white specks problem ko alag tareeke se dekh rahe hain. Mein 66 saal ka hoon aur mard hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the patient's symptoms of swollen tonsils, white specks in throat, and taste problems? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils turned red with inflammation.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, mujhe bahut jyada chinta hai meri beemari ke baare mein. Pichle kuch mahino se, mujhe aisa lagta hai ki mere gale ke piche ek baal hai aur raat mein ye aur bhi bharti hai. Mere kaan mein bhi dard hai aur mujhe apne gardan ke right side mein teen matar ke aakar ke ganthe mahsoos hoti hain. Mujhe kuch mahine pehle do baar sardi hui thi aur acidity ke liye maine do din se Omeprazole le raha hoon. Mai sharab bahut peeta hoon aur kuch saalo se weed bhi foonk raha hoon. Main doctors ke paas apne gale ke problem ki wajah se gaya tha, aur unhone mere gale ke piche flashlight se check kiya aur swab kiya, sab saaf dikha. Mujhe ENT ke liye refer kiya gaya hai, lekin mujhe kuch hafte intezaar karna hai. Abhi maine apna gala check kiya aur dekha ki mera tonsil suj gaya hai. Kripya doctor, is vartaman condition ko dekhen aur ek taraf numb sa lag raha hai. Lekin mujhe nigalne ke samay isse mahsoos nahi hota. Mai bahut darr gaya hoon ki mujhe tonsil cancer ho gaya hai. Kya aap pictures dekhkar meri bata sakte hain ki kya dono tonsils suj gaye hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the patient's swollen tonsil, hair-like sensation in the throat, ear pain, and neck lumps indicate tonsil cancer? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. There is no sign of tonsils swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe urinary tract infection hai. Lekin mere inner thigh par bright red aur kuchh rash hai, jaise ki mere virgins area ke aaspass. Ab maine antibiotic liya hai, to thoda sa relief to hua hai, lekin main ab bhi sore, burns, aur bahut uncomfortable feel kar rahi hoon jab mai move karti hoon. Jab main apne aapko dekhti hoon, to lagta hai ki meri skin dry hai aur bahut red aur peeling jaise dikh rahi hai.. Issey kaise relief pa sakti hoon. Niche jo image hai, wo attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What can be done to relieve the discomfort, burning, and dry, peeling, red skin around the inner thigh and genital area? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mai ek 27 saal ki mahila hoon aur mujhe tonsillitis ka diagnosis hua hai. Maine ek hafte ka penicillin course shuru kiya hai aur mere symptoms hain sore throat, enlarged aur pus covered tonsils, swollen neck glands, fever aur headaches. Raat ko mai bahut pasina baha rahi hoon. Pichhle hafte mujhe thakan ki shikayat ke saath doctor ke paas gayi thi, lekin us samay mujhe sore throat nahi tha.Kripya dekhein is image ko jise pareshan area doctor ne below kiya hai. Wohne mera chest check kiya aur bataya ki woh ek heart murmur sun sakti hai- ye pehli baar kisi doctor ne isko identify kiya hai. Mai yeh soch rahi hoon kya ye dono correlated ho sakte hai. Dhanyavaad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is there a correlation between tonsillitis symptoms and the newly detected heart murmur in a 27-year-old female patient? The image here shows the condition of swollen tonsils

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor, mera baby 1 mahine ka hai aur uske right cheek pe lal daane aaye the jinke baad wo poore chehre, scalp, shoulders aur chest pe spread ho gaye. 2 hafte baad woh thick dry aur flakey skin ban gaye jise wo blankets par ragadta hai aur apne haathon se pakadta hai. Main aqeous cream lagati hoon aur us par koi bhi products use nahi karti. Jab rash ne poora chehra cover kar liya tha tab maine GP se mila aur unhone baby acne keh diya. Main chinta kar rahi hoon ki kya ye exzema ho sakta hai kyun ki mujhe asthma, exzema aur hay fever hai. Kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye vartaman condition ko dekhe. Aur uska naak beh raha hai aur bahut hi bad smelling wind pass kar raha hai jo itni choti umar mein maine kabhi nahi dekha (abhi 10 hafte hue hai). Wo exclusively formula feed ho raha hai kyun ki breastfeeding unsuccessful rahi, main chinta kar rahi hoon ki kya ye allergy ho sakta hai...
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the red rash, dry flakey skin, runny nose, and bad smelling wind in a formula-fed baby an allergic reaction? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Red spots on the left should and back area. Multiple spots with redness.

Hinglish_Question: Hello doctor,Meri beti pregnant thi aur usko extreme dard hua tha. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Doctors ne kaha ki ye normal hai. Lekin baad mein pata chala ki usko heart failure ho gaya tha, uski BNP levels bahut high the aur baby ko induced karna pada. Ab wo apne original hospital mein wapas hai. Uski ankles ke aas paas ki swelling bahut severe hai aur iske bare mein kuch bhi nahi ho raha hai. Mujhe kya karna chahiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: What can be done about the severe ankle edema in a pregnant woman who experienced heart failure and high BNP levels? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. Bothe the legs are swollen with one leg with redness in one leg.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mere paas ek newborn hai jiski skin clear aur smooth thi, lekin uske gaal par chote red spots develop hone shuru ho gaye, jo ab uske gale, kaan ke niche aur ab unke torso tak fail gaye hain. Mujhe ye jaanna hai ki kya ye garmi ki wajah se hui rash hai ya fir laundry detergent ki sensitivity hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko below.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the baby's skin rash on the cheeks, neck, under the ears, and torso due to a heat rash or detergent sensitivity? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Red spots on the left should and back area. Multiple spots with redness.

Hinglish_Question: Meri beti abhi hamare metal bed frame par gir gayi aur uske naak aur gaal ke beech aur bhujh mein takra gayi. Wo thoda suj gaya hai aur skin ke peeche bruising lag raha hai. Please dekhe, neeche attached image. Humne us par ice rakhi hai aur wo sirf sohna chahti hai, jise humne maan liya. Kya hume chinta karne ki zarurat hai? Kya hum kuch kar sakte hain ya dhyan mein rakh sakte hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should the patient be concerned about the swelling and bruising on their daughter's neck and between her eyebrows after a fall? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The sole has swollen with red and yellow rashes in the little toe finger and noel

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mujhe apne right armpit mein ek badi gaanth hai. Main ise tabhi mehsoos kar sakti hoon jab main apna haath upar uthati hoon ya apne sir ke piche chhu leti hoon, tab yeh aur bhi bada ho jati hai. Main right-handed hoon aur gaanth mere left armpit ke muqabale mein badi hai. Mere do gaanthe hain - ek-ek armpit mein, dono jagah par same hai. Mujhe aisa lagta hai ki ye mere peeth ya kandhe ka hissa hai. Yeh sakht hai aur sirf tab dard karti hai jab main thoda samay tak usse touch karte hoon aur kabhi kabhi touch karne se jyada badi bhi ho jati hai. Doctor, iski image neeche attached hai. Ye ek saal se hai jabse main weight training shuru ki aur mujhe yeh pata nahi hai ki kya yeh kuch serious hai ya mere muscles ka hissa hai. Main haal hi mein blood test karwaya tha aur ek hisse mein thoda sa fail ho gayi thi - infection wala hissa, lekin sirf 0.4 ke hisab se. Kaafi pareshan hoon, lekin main bilkul swasth hoon. Main kam se kam teen baar tennis khelti hoon har hafte, bas sirf mera armpit din ke baad mein dard karta hai jahan par yeh gaanth hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the large, hard lumps in the patient's armpits that only hurt after touching and worsen with activity? The image shows the condition of hand lump. Two circulara lumps on the wrist, side by side and the area in between also swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe strep throat itni baar ho chuka hai ki ginne ki koshish bhi na kar saku, lekin lagbhag 5 saal pehle mujhe sabse bura strep infection hua tha (throat itna suj gaya tha ki saans lene mein dikkat ho rahi thi aur isko dur karne ke liye 3 tarah ke antibiotics liye...). Uske baad us infection ke baad mujhe specialist ke paas refer kiya gaya tha taka wo humesha hone wale infections ko dekh sake aur dekhein ki mujhe tonsils nikalne chahiye ya nahi (repetitive infections ki wajah se) lekin unhone kaha ki agar mujhe ek aur infection hua to wo remove kar denge lekin uske baad se mujhe koi bhi infection nahi hua hai. Itna ajeeb hai kyunki jabse main bachapan se tha mujhe har saal 2-5 strep infections hote the, lekin us akhri pagal infection ke baad - NONE! Aur akhiri infection ke kuch mahine baad maine apne right tonsil par ek safed/grey spot (lagbhag 1/2 inch ka size) notice kiya tha, pareshan nahi the, maine soch tha ki sayad scar tissue ya kuch samjho. Haal hi mein, mujhe notice hua ki woh safed area purple/black color mein badal gaya hai. Koi vichar hai? Mere smoking ka kuch itihas hai - kya mujhe chinta honi chahiye ya nahi. Wahan ke aas-paas dard nahi hai, sirf anormal color hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a patient with a history of repetitive strep throat infections be concerned about a purplish/black discoloration on their tonsil? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. There swollen red mass present in the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, mere paas ek sawal hai. Aaj maine 2.2 mile tak walk kiya aur mujhe waha ek gath hai, jo ki kathor nahi hai lekin dikhne mein ek gaanth jaisa hai, jiske wajah se shayad 2 saal ho gaye hai. Doctor, kripya neeche diye gaye image ko dekh lijiye. Iski wajah se mujhe kabhi taklif nahi hoti, bas jab main lambe faslo tak chalti hu, tab bohut dard hota hai, jaise kichav ho raha ho aur bahut tez dard karta hai, jaise ki mere vein mein ho (jispar mere is hi taang mein ek varicose vain hai jiski vajah se kabhi koi dikkat nahi hoti thi) aur phir ek sujan, tez dard, sunapan jaisa mahsus hota hai, jaise ki main pura din ek jagah bethi rahi ho. Madad kijiye, main pareshan hoon kyunki main dua karti hoon ki yeh blood clot na ho aur mujhe doctor afford nahi kar sakti hai. Lekin mujhe apne college mein ek walk assessment ke liye train karni hai. Dhanyavad,Chandra
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the presence of a pain-inducing lump, throbbing, tingling, sharp pain, and numbness during long walks suggest a blood clot? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. The knee has a swelling with a slight pain.

Hinglish_Question: Mere gardan ke pichhle bayan taraf, baalon ki limit ke pass ek ganth hai. Isko touch karne par bahut hard lagta hai aur bone jaisa mehsoos hota hai. Isko touch karne par dard hota hai aur touch karne ke baad kam se kam 15 minutes tak dard hota rahta hai. Kabhi kabhi touch kiye bina bhi dard hota hai. Mein hospital gaya tha jaha se mujhe ek dermatologist ke paas bheja gaya. Unhone ganth ko mehsoos kiya aur mujhe kaha ki wo ye nahi jante ki yeh kya hai, isliye unhone mujhe kuch antibiotics diye aur kaha ki agar ye thik nahi ho toh wapas ajaaiye.Doctor kripya niche patient ki image dekhe, kuch problem hai meri gardan mein. Antibiotics khatam hone ke baad bhi ganth wahin hai aur dard kar rahi hai, isliye jald hi main hospital ja raha hoon, par shayad ek hafte tak ya usse bhi zyada ho sakta hai. Bas yeh jaanne ke liye poochna chahta hoon ki aapko iska koi idea hai ya nahi.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a painful, bonelike lump on the back of the neck near the hairline that persists after antibiotics? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The neck is swollen in one side and there is a red spot in the neck

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mujhe haal hi mein herpes ka diagnosis hua hai, abhi tak pata nahi hai ki konse type ka hai, lekin ye ek halka case lag raha hai kyun ki mere lips har roz suj jaate hain lekin koi cold sores nahi hote. Please doctor, dekhiye ye vartaman condition ko. Sirf do chote se bumps hai aur sujran hai, saath mein tingling aur jeebh ke tip mein tingling hai. Kya sujran eventually ruk jayegi, kyun ki ye to shuruat ki outbreak hai, bas lag raha hai ki ye ruk hi nahi rahi hai! Mujhe sach mein pagal kar degi hai aur mujhe ummeed hai ki ye ruk jayegi :(
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient experienced lip swelling, tingling, and bumps. Worried about initial herpes outbreak. Will swelling eventually stop? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Bright pink coloured skin with darkening at one place on inner side of lower lip.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe kal ek ghante ka massage tha. Adhe ghante ke baad... mere daayen taraf gale mein bada sujan ho gaya hai. Doctor kripya patient ki picture dekhein, mere gale mein kuch problem hai. Samjha ki massage se nikalne wale ras se hua hai. Baseball size ka ganth hai. Massage ke baad raat bhar aur aaj pura din pani piya hai. Ab mujhe aisa lag raha hai ki main ek goldfish hoon. Ab woh ganth sach mein badh gayi hai aur mere double chin ke area mein latki hui hai. Dard ho raha hai. Bhaari lag raha hai. Sparsh se garam hai. Tvacha bahut laal hai. Sar ko neeche jhukana mushkil ho raha hai. Jimeny cricket... mujhe kuchh ho toh nahi raha hai na...
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's neck swelling increasing in size, hanging in the area of the double chin, and accompanied by pain, redness, and limited head movement? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck near the ear is swollen. The neck below the lower jaw is red and swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, Mere mathe par ek severe rash hai jo dard kar raha hai aur khujli bhi ho rahi hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Kya aap kripaya ek nazar dal sakte hai aur treatment suggest kar sakte hai? Mujhe dar hai ki ye skin allergy ya shayad cancer ke onset ka sign ho sakta hai. Mene Fluticasone propionate, Flutivate aur Ketoderm-Hydroval Cr AA 50:50 gm cream try kiya hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the recommended treatment for a severe, painful, and itchy rash on the forehead that may be related to skin allergy or cancer? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question:
AI feel choked up in the neck area, and have a hard time swallowing liquid. Sometimes the sensation goes away for a day, but returns and gets worse as the day goes along. My neck makes a noise similar to a hungry stomach. Along with this, which started about 2 years ago, I came down with chronic hives, so I assumed it was hives causing my throat to swell because I ve had my feet and knees also swell up.Please doctor see the current condition below . Also, I ve found that I can t seem to get enough sleep. I force myself up on workdays, however, on days off I will sleep until noon or 1 pm, and even then, it s difficult to get out of bed. I also have been losing quite a bit of hair, and have itchy welts throughout my scalp...HELP!!!

Maine feel kiya ki mere gale ke area me choked up hai aur liquid nigalne me mushkil ho rahi hai. Kabhi-kabhi ye ahsaas ek din ke liye chala jata hai, lekin wapas aata hai aur din bhar badhta hai. Mere gale se awaz aati hai jo ek bhooke pet ki awaz ke jaisi hoti hai. Iske saath, jiska shuru hone mein lagbhag 2 saal ho gaye, mujhe chronic hives bhi ho gayi, isliye maine ye samjha ki mujhe hives ke karan gale suj gya hai kyunki mere paanv aur ghutne bhi suj gaye hai. Please doctor dekhiye is vartaman condition ko below. Aur maine ye bhi paya hai ki mujhe nei sona nahi ho raha hai. Workdays mein main khudko uthata hoon, lekin chhuttiyo mein main dopehar ya 1 baje tak sota hoon aur uske baad bhi bed se uthna mushkil hai. Mere balon kaafi jyada gir rahe hai aur mere scalp par itching ho rahi hai...HELP!!!
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing difficulty swallowing, chronic hives, knee swelling, excessive sleepiness, hair loss, and itchy welts on the scalp? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. The left knee is swollen wild mid redness.

Hinglish_Question: Mere pati ko ek hafte se upper jaw pain (right side) ho raha hai aur uske chehre (upper lip, cheeks, chin) mein swelling 2 din se ho rahi hai. Please doctor, dekhein is vartaman condition ko. Aaj emergency room mein jaane par allergic reaction ke baare mein puchne par uska blood pressure 162 over 119 nikla. Mujhe chinta hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the possible cause of the upper jaw pain, facial swelling, and high blood pressure in this patient? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Pea sized swelling on lower left side of the lip. Rounded with redness and little shinyness.

Hinglish_Question: Main Sandhya hoon, 22 saal ki hoon, aur female hoon. Bangalore, India se hoon. Main ek MBBS student hoon. Mujhe ek mahine se chest pain ho rahi hai. Retro-sternal hai, squeezing type ki, aur intermittent nature hai. Uska image neeche attached hai. Lying down aur deep breathing par aggravate hoti hai aur aspirin lene par relieve ho jaati hai. Mujhe teen hafte se pitting type ki pedal edema notice ho rahi hai, jo knee tak hai, aur ek hafte se generalized bhi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the possible cause of Sandhya's retro-sternal chest pain, pedal edema, and generalized edema? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. Both the legs are swelled with no redness and the skin have become black

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe kuch din pehle itchy head and neck hone laga tha. Meri chhoti 2 saal ki beti ko bhi usi samay chest par rash ho gaya aur wo apne sar aur gale ko khujlane lagi. Sirf ek cheez hi badli thi, maine ek babysitter hire ki thi jiski ek kutta hai, black lap, brittany spaniel mix, aur ye ladki pehle army mein kaam karti thi. Ab kuch din baad mujhe apne sir aur gale mein itchy bumps mehsoos hote hain aur meri beti bhi apne sar aur gale ki skin ko khujlati hai. Main ek chhote se laal rash ko bhi uske kaan ke peeche dekh rahi hoon. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the itchy head and neck, rash on the chest, and small red rash behind the ear related to hiring a babysitter with a dog? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Small muliple red spots present on the skin. Clustered spots of rash.

Hinglish_Question: Mere pyare doctor, kal subah utha to mujhe halka sa sujaa aur khoonile left eye tha jo din bhar mein aur bhi bura ho gaya (pehle wale din to sab theek tha). Aaj utha to mera eye double size ho gaya hai sath hi temperature, headache, chills aur thoda sa sore throat bhi hai. Mein doctor ke paas gaya aur apne symptoms bataye, including that at work mere colleague ko glandular fever hua tha haal hi mein. Doctor ne meri ankhon ka checkup kiya, drops diye aur bhej diya. Meri aankh to theek nahi hui hai, har do ghante mein drops karne ke bawajood. Please doctor, dekhiye meri aankhen neeche wali image mein. Mujhe abhi bhi sabhi symptoms hai aur koi bhi utar raha nahi. Mera right eye bilkul theek hai, isliye main do din se sujaa aur behti hui aankhon ko conjunctivitis hone ke liye sahi nahi samajh raha hoon. Mujhe 16 saal ki umra mein glandular fever bhi tha. Kripya salah dein.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of swollen and bloodshot eyes, along with temperatures, headache, chills, and a sore throat? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Entire under-eye part swelling present with light pink coloration.

Hinglish_Question: Hi Doc- Mera doctor ne bataya hai ki mujhe Hepatitis A hai, aur ye ek ya do mahine mein theek ho jayega. Pichle kuch dino se mujhe thoda bukhar tha aur bahut thakan bhi ho rahi thi. Abhi abhi meri aankhon mein laal aur jalan ho rahi hai, Please doctor, dekhiye ye aankhein niche ki taraf. Aur mujhe lag raha hai ki ye bhi Hep A se hi hua hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does red and watery eyes with irritation accompany fatigue and slight fever in Hepatitis A patients?  The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The white part of the eye has turned red and swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, mere fore arm ke side par rash shuru hua, jo meri chest, stomach aur legs me fail gaya. Shuru mein rash painful tha phir itchy ho gaya. Main weak feel kar raha hoon, consistent cough, head aches aur fatigue. Ab meri arm ke rash suj gaye hain aur skin ke neeche hard ho rahe hain. Maine kai doctors aur dermatologist ko dikhaaya hai aur biopsy results ka intezaar kar raha hoon. Koi idea hai ki ye kya ho sakta hai. Uski image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a painful and itchy rash spreading from the arm to the chest, stomach, and legs, accompanied by weakness, cough, headaches, and fatigue? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Haan. Mai 71 saal ka hoon. Type 2 diabetic hoon aur insulin use karta hoon. Kuch 1 saal pehle mere left calf muscle mein tenderness hone lagi aur uske baad internal pain bhi muscle mein shamil hui. Sirf left side mein. Haal hi mein left calf aur left foot mein swelling bhi ho rahi hai. Blood clots aur varicose veins ke liye test karwaya gaya hai. Hep C ka bhi test karwaya hai. Affected area ka sonogram, dono legs ke lower Venus region ka sonogram aur left groin area ka CT scan bhi karwaya hai. Kisi ko pain ka cause ya swelling ka cause nahi pata. Kya aap ek baar try karenge? Please doctor, neeche diye gaye affected area ke image ko dekhiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of tenderness, internal pain, swelling in left calf muscle and foot in a 71-year-old diabetic patient? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. The knees in both of the legs have swollen and there is also slight deformation

Hinglish_Question: Meri 20 mahine ki beti gir gayi hai aur uski right eye suj gayi hai, jaise ki woh kaali ho jayegi aur uske maathe par ek ubhaar hai. Use bahut zyada dard nahi ho raha hai, kyun ki ye lagbhag 6 ghante pehle hua tha. Kripya doctor, neeche diye gaye aankhon ko dekhein. Kya koi chance hai ki bone damage hai? Mujhe girna toh nahi dikha, par staircases shamil thay.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the likelihood of bone damage in the swollen eye and bump on the forehead resulting from a fall involving stairs? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Little swelling on the lateral side of the right eye's eyelid.

Hinglish_Question: Meri 78 saal ki maa ko pairo me badhti hui sujan hai. Please dekhein, kuch foot par hua hai neeche. Is sujan ne uske right leg tak upar tak faila di hai. Usne 12 saal pehle stroke ke baad ek stent lagwaya tha. Usko bilkul bhi koi dard nahi hai. Sujan itni badh gayi hai ki main use kisi bhi tarah ki shoe nahi pehana sakta. Ye sujan 2-3 hafte se badhti ja rahi hai. Uski sirf ek acchi kidney bachi hai. Kya aur koi lakshan hai jo kidney failure ka sanket ho sakta hai. Wo doctor ke paas nahi jaegi.
multimodal_Question_summ: Does the increasing swelling in the foot, extending up to the thigh, indicate kidney failure in a patient with one functional kidney and a history of stroke and stent placement? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot has turned red and blue and swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Hi 2 hafte pehle, mujhe notice hua ki mere gale ke left side par ek choti, sakht ganth hai, jiski size ek chhote pencil ke erase ke size ke barabar hai. Doctor, kripya patient ki image dekh  niche notice kiya, mere gale mein kuch samasya hai. Ye dardrahit tha, isliye main ise bhool gaya. Lekin aaj mujhe ek dardakar sir dard ho raha hai aur maine apne sir ke piche ke bottom right hand side par ek similar sakht ganth payi hai. To maine apne gale ki ganth ko check kiya aur uski size aadhi ungali ke barabar badh gayi hai. Abhi tak maine doctor se mila nahi hai kyunki mujhe nahi pata ki ye bura hai ya nahi. Kya main apne doctor se milna chahiye? Kya ye gambhir hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I be concerned about painless neck swelling that has grown and a new lump on the head with a throbbing headache? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. The part of the neck near the ear is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Shaniwar ko, mere left arm aur collar bone area ke paas chest par, mujhe ye laal daane (hajaaro ki sankhya me) mile hain. Mujhe ghayal nahi hua hai aur is rash ke kaaran mujhe koi vajah soojh nahi aa rahi hai. Skin abhi bhi smooth hai. Mujhe puri ummeed hai ki ye Petechia hai. Lekin, iska kaaran kya ho sakta hai. Main ek 44 saal ki mahila hoon. Mujhe spinal arthritis, degenerative disc disease, bulging aur herniated discs, wagaira ki wajah se chronic pain ka samna karna padta hai. Uske liye image neeche attached hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing the thousands of red spots resembling petechiae on a woman with chronic spinal pain? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mere last bloodwork mein low potassium levels and elevated kidney function tests ka result aaya hai. Main diuretics le rahi hoon hip replacement surgery ke baad, jiske karan low potassium ho sakta hai, lekin mujhe ye nahi pata ki kidney function tests ka elevated result kya indicate karta hai. Mujhe surgery ke baad paroxysmal A-fib tha, jo well controlled tha, lekin ab ye A-fib chronic ho gaya hai. Mujhe ye sab samajh nahi aata ki ye sab kya hai aur kya ye sab connected hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the significance of low potassium, elevated kidney function tests, edema, and chronic A-fib after a hip replacement surgery? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The left hand is swollen.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste sir ya madam...........main 23 saal ki ladki hoon, apni postgraduation kar rahi hoon. Kuch dino se mere dono pairon ke neeche dard hai jo thoda painful hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko ........ maine kabhi bhi kidney disorder ya kisi aur health related problem ka koi itihas nahi rakha hai...........toh kya mujhe iska reason aur uska ilaaj pata chal sakta hai?
multimodal_Question_summ: 23-year-old female with painful edema in both legs below knees. Requesting reason and treatment for condition with no known health issues. The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The right leg has swelling with redness.

Hinglish_Question: हैलो सर, मैं 24 साल का हूँ और बॉर्डर सिक्योरिटी पर्सनेल हूँ। सर, मेरी समस्या बताने से पहले मैं आपको बताना चाहूंगा कि मुझे 2013 अक्टूबर से यह समस्या है, जो मेरे घुटने से नीचे और मेरे कमरे से ऊपर की है। मुझे खूब खुजली होती है और मैं आपको बताने के लिए शब्द नहीं कर सकता कि यह कितनी होती है और जब मैं खुजलाता हूं तो वह लाल दाग के रूप में बदल जाती है और धीरे-धीरे यह बहुत बड़ी क्षेत्र में फैल जाती है और कभी-कभी खून बहने लगता है। फिर मैं इस पर क्लोबेटा जीएम लगाता हूं, जो मुझे कुछ समय के लिए राहत देता है, लेकिन फिर से पुरानी समस्या वापस आ जाती है। और अब कुछ क्षेत्र में जब खुजलना शुरू होता है, मैं इस पर खुजलाता हूं और इसके कारण यह सफेद कठोर त्वचा बन जाती है और इसके ऊपर के चोंट लगने से यह घाव हो जाता है। 8 महीने हो गए हैं, मुझे क्या करना चाहिए, मैं डिप्रेशन में हूं क्योंकि मैं एक सैनिक के रूप में बॉर्डर क्षेत्र में तैनात हूं जहां केवल औषधि की दुकान के अलावा कोई डॉक्टर उपलब्ध नहीं है। कृपया मेरी मदद करें डॉक्टर, यह एक सैनिक की अपील है। नीचे इसका चित्र संलग्न किया गया है।
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of persistent itching, red patches, bleeding, and white rough skin with wounds on the border security personnel's lower body? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Kal dopahar ko, maine apne hoth ki taraf (aapke daayen taraf) ek ganth aur doosri adams apple ke seedhe dagmagahat ki taraf ek ganth dekhi hai. Doctor, kripya neeche patient ki tasveer dekhen, mujhe neeche naak ke ilaake mein koi samasya hai. Shuruwat mein mujhe laga ki ye ek ingrown hair ya kuchh aisa hai, lekin aaj raat bhar sone ke baad ye dono bade aur dardnak ho gaye hai. Mujhe sardi lagi thi, lekin mujhe samajh nahi aa raha ki hoth ki taraf wali ganth kahan se aayi hogi. Fir se, ye bilkul achanak dikhi aur pehle kabhi aise koi lakshan nahi the, siwaye gaal ke glandon mein sujan ke jab bhi gana gaane ya beemar hone ki wajah se hoti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of sudden painful chin and neck lumps in a patient with a cold? The image here shows a medical condition related to neck_swelling. There is round shaped swelling in the neck below the lower jaws.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, main 34 saal ke ek mard hoon. Mujhe often right sided headache hota hai aur ek pressure sensation bhi hoti hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki mere right side mein kuch movement hai. Maine apne physician ke paas gaya aur unhone CAT scan aur blood tests order kiye. Sare reports normal the, lekin CAT scan ne kaha ki mujhe sinus infection hai. Mere blood work bhi acche the. Mujhe apne sir mein heart beat sensation feel hoti hai. Main apna right side head ache ko aisa describe karunga jaise ki meri sar ne wall se hit ki ho. Aur saath hi, mujhe apne right eye mein thoda pressure, itching aur dard bhi feel hota hai. Meri vision acchi hai. Meri right eye mein redness ho gayi thi aur mujhe eye specialist ke paas refer kiya gaya. Unhone ek detailed examination aur vision tests kiye. Meri vision perfect batayi gayi thi. Dono aankhon mein 20 tha. Lekin unhone kaha ki meri right eye mein pressure jyada hai, 22 hai. Agli visit mein, yeh 24 tha. Meri left eye pressure 14 ya 18 tha. Lekin unhone kaha ki yeh glaucoma nahi hai. Unhone allergies ke liye kuch drops aur infection ke liye antibiotics prescribe kiye. Ab mujhe apni right eye pressure se chinta ho rahi hai. Kya mujhe glaucoma hai? Kya mujhe jaldi se andha ho jayega? Ye image uska screenshot hai jiske liye refer kiya gaya tha.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the cause of the patient's right-sided headache, pressure sensation, eye redness, and elevated eye pressure? The image shows the condition of eye inflamation. Right side of the eye's blood vessels swollen and red. A circular red spot of blood clot also present.

Hinglish_Question: Mera age hai 20, ek hamare relative ne hame bataya hai ki apse contact kare kyuki hume bahut zarurat hai. Mere paas eczema hai aur maine 5 saal se multiple doctors ke saath medications li hai lekin koi acha result nahi mila... kuch kaam karte hai kuch nahi karte. Sabse bada problem hai ki mujhe 3 saal se running nose hai, muh ke aas paas ki skin black scars ke saath round ho jati hai, gardan pe puri black rough skin hai aur pichle 6 mahino se mujhe aankhon mein allergy hai with watery eyes, kabhi kabhi redness, itching aur poore aas paas dark circles. Main ek doctor ke paas 6 mahino se consultation kar rahi hu... Main three months mein do baar prescription uski share karungi jisko sirf 15 din tak hi istemaal karna tha, usse zyada nahi but 15 din ke baad abhi mujhe halka sa eye pain hua hai aur dark circles ke aas paas bhi. Maine eye doctor se bhi check kara hai aur unhone kuch ointments aur drops diye hai lekin kuch faayda nahi hua. Request hai ki aap bhi similar medicines prescribe kare jo meri problem mein help kare. Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What medications can be prescribed for a 20-year-old with eczema, running nose, black scars, rough neck skin, and eye allergy symptoms? The image shows the condition of eye inflamation. Redness both above and below the eye with yellowish parts as well.

Hinglish_Question: Baby girl 17 months ki hai, teething kar rahi hai, aur 7 din pehle hi hand, foot, and mouth hone ka pata chala. Teen din tak bukhar tha, uske baad hum ped ke paas gaye. 6 din pehle usne carpeted floor par gir gayi aur pacifier munh mein thi. Munh se khoon nikla. Kripya doctor, mouh niche dekhe. Upar ke masude ab bhi bahut suj gaye hain, wo poori tarah se 4 upar ke daanto ko cover kar rahe hain aur kuch pus hai. Kya ye ek sankraman hai ya shayad ye hand, foot, and mouth / teething ke wajah se hai.
multimodal_Question_summ:
Is the swollen and pus-filled gums in the baby girl's mouth due to hand, foot, and mouth disease, teething or an infection? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. Unhone antibiotics diye hai, phir bhi, agar ye abscess ki shuruat hai toh. Mein peroxyl se kulla kar raha hoon. Jab ise tap karta hoon tab daant thoda dard karta hai. Kya ye abscess ki shuruat hai, aapko kya lagta hai? Please doctor, mouth ko dekhiye.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the painful ulcer in the patient's mouth potentially a beginning stage of an abscess, or is it a gum problem? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. White circular swelling on the inner side of the lower tooth line or below the front of the tongue.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, meri paanch saal ki beti poori week se bht beemar hai aur uski temperature bht high hai. Maine use hamare doctor ke paas le gaya aur doctor ne bataya ki ye chest infection hai aur antibiotic prescribe kiya. Lekin temperature ek puri week tak chal raha hai! Kal use hives ki tarah spots aa gaye (jaise ki bee sting ke baad). Ye rash dono haatho, nakhoon, pairo aur taango par bhi aa gaye, saath hi uske kaano aur chehre par bhi! Maine use turant wapis apne doctor ke paas le gaya jo keh rahi thi ki ye kisi tarah ki allergy hai. Usne use steroids ki course diya lekin aaj rash abhi bhi dikh raha hai, bas dull red spots ki tarah skin ke neeche. Kya ye normal hai ek reaction ke baad? Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Dhanyawaad, Grace.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is a dull red skin rash persisting after a reaction normal, following a high temperature and chest infection? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Pinkish spots on the skin with white dots in the center of big spots.

Hinglish_Question: Mere 21 saal ke bete ko mouth me kai canker sores hai jo 5 din pehle shuru hue hai (pehle kabhi nahi the). Usko ab bhi ek pounding headache hai. Mouth pain ko ease karne ke liye oral gel ke alawa, use mouthwash try kiya hai aur hydrogen peroxide se swish kiya hai (meri salah nahi thi) aur dard bahut jyada ho raha hai. Kya headache aur mouth sores related hai? Ya phir unko individually treat karna chahiye. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Headache ko Advil bilkul bhi relieve nahi kar raha hai (wo college mein hai aur advice maang raha hai).
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the new occurence of canker sores in the mouth and the pounding headache related? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. 3 circular white patches of swelling together completely surrounded by redness around the affected area which is on the immediate inner side of the lower lips.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 2 aur half mahine pehle 3 din tak high fever hua tha aur uske baad mere sharir me rashes hona shuru ho gaye, fir meri twacha bahut sukhi hone lagi. Mai skin specialist ke paas gaya tha jiske baad thoda thik hua. Mere baal bhi gir rhe the, par maine jyada dhyan nahi diya, lekin ab mujhe notice ho rha hai ki jab mai baal dhota hoon to baal jhadt raha hai aur mere baal bahut kam ho gaye hain. Iski image neeche di gyi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of dry rashes, hair loss, and scanty hair after a high fever three months ago? The image shows the condition of skin rash.  Pinkish red multuiple single coloured rash on the skin present close to each other.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, mujhe dono taraf ke angles par mandible ka bilateral fracture tha aur maine surgery karwa li hai. Chhe hafto ke baad, ek taraf thoda sa sujan hai aur lower lip aur lower lip ke niche ki chhoti si jagah mein sunpan aa raha hai. Uski image neeche attach ki gayi hai. Kitna samay lagega ki sujan aur sunpan poora tarah se kam ho jaye.
multimodal_Question_summ: How long will it take for the swelling and numbness in the lower lip and surrounding skin to completely go away after bilateral mandible fracture surgery? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. The left side of lower lip contains the swelling.

Hinglish_Question: Hi doctor, mujhe kuch hafto se thakan mehsoos ho rahi hai. Mujhe neend nahi aati hai. Subah mujhe aankhen poori tarah nahi khol pa rahi hai. Mere sir mein dard hai aur gardan me akad hai. Urgent Care mein gaya tha kyunki chest pain tha, unhone ECG aur khoon ka test kiya aur mujhe bataya ki dil se koi chinta ki baat nahi hai aur mujhe shayad GERD ho sakta hai aur mujhe acidity ki dawai di. Headache ki wajah se maine ENT doctor se follow up karwaya. ENT doctor ne mujhe bataya ki mujhe sinus infection hai. Maine doctor dwara diye gaye antibiotics ko 7 din tak liya par ab bhi thakan hai, neend ka mehsoos hai aur gale aur gardan mein kuch takleef hai. Teen saal pehle mujhe asid reflex the aur mujhe bahut cough aata tha isliye mujhe tonsils ho gaye the. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe nahi pata ki headache aur thakan ka karan kya hai. Iska kya koi link hai brain stroke ya gastro problems ke saath. Mujhe is wajah se bahut chinta aur tanav hai. Vartaman mein, mujhe Amoxicillin, Fluticasone, Prednisone aur Ranitidine tablets le rahe hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's fatigue, headache, neck stiffness, and swollen tonsils related to a brain stroke or gastrointestinal issues? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. The tonsils are swollen with no discolourations.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste Sir, mere sir ki twacha par ek ganth ya shayad boil hai. Pichle 4 saal se hai aur unki size kuch sabji pe jaise hoti hai. Ismein koi dard nahi hai. Bas wo ek kadi, mauti hui mans ki tarah hai. Kripya niche patient ki twacha ki tasveer dekhe. Koi khujli bhi nahi hai. Shuruwat mein jab ye badhti thi tab maine ise dabaya aur mujhe koi dard nahi hua aur usmein se kuch kaali rang ki cheez nikli. Uske baad ye badhti rahi aur ab ye fix ho gayi hai. Lekin mujhe chinta hai ki ganth ke pas mein do aur bahut choti ganthein bhi hai. Pehli ganth jaisi hi. Kripya mujhe bataye ki ye kya hai aur mujhse ye kyun ho raha hai aur iska ilaj kaise hoga.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the symptom's cause and how can it be cured if the patient has a lump on their head for 4 years? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_growth. There is black coloured tissue/mass elevated from the surface on the skin.

Hinglish_Question: Mere potay ke aas paas ankho ke upar lalima hai - meri bahu ne kaha ki doctor ne bhi isko notice kiya hai - mujhe is baat se pareshan hai ki mere potay ko bathroom mein hi snan karte hain jahan par unke linen closet ke neeche cat litter rakha hota hai - woh kuch samay se pahle se pila lag raha hai - woh abhi do saal ka ho gaya hai - waise bhi, unki rehne wali ghar ne raydon test ko pass nahi kiya jab unhone use khareeda tha - iske neeche ek mitti wala crawl space hai - kya inme se koi bhi cheez samasya ka karan ho sakti hai. Kripya doctor, dekhiye aankhein niche di gayi hain.
multimodal_Question_summ: Can exposure to cat litter, radon in the house, or a dirt crawl space cause eye redness and pale appearance in a two-year-old? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The bottom part of the eye has turned red.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste Sir, mujhe last 3-4 din se viral fever hai. Symptoms hai joint pains, muscles pain, mere aankhon mein kuch problem hai. Please doctor, dekhiye yeh aankhein nichle jabde mein hai. Aur kabhi-kabhi bahut thand lagti hai, jo mujhe bechain kar rahi hai. Main paracetamol le raha hoon. Kripya suggest karein ki iss condition mein mujhe kya khana chahiye jisse jaldi thik ho jau. Dhanyavad, Puneet
multimodal_Question_summ: What should I eat to recover quickly from viral fever with symptoms of joint and muscle pain, eye redness, and feeling cold? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The left eye has turned red and is swollen

Hinglish_Question: Arms and legs kaafi samay se itching kar rahe hain. Sab bedding aur clothes dho diye, pollen ke case me. Do mahine se istemaal kar rahe lotion ko bandh diya hai kyunki usme honey, beeswax hai aur woh meri newest soap aur lotion me se hai. OTC Benadryl le kar rah chuke hain, par koi zyada relief nahi hai. Sach kahun toh jahan itching hoti hai wahan pe rash ho raha hai. Kyunki mere skin dry hai, main aquaphore use kar raha hoon as a lotion, aur woh turant soak ho ja raha hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Rash ko rokne aur itching ko control karne ke liye mein kya kar sakta hoon.
multimodal_Question_summ: How can the patient relieve the rash and itching caused by dry skin after discontinuing a lotion with honey and beeswax? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. The skin is coming out as white peels.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe joint pain (knees, shoulders and right large toe) aur swelling mainly in my knees se pareshani ho rahi hai. Doctor please dekhiye neeche current condition ki image. Mujhe lagta hai ki meri knees mein swelling ki wajah se strength loose ho gayi hai aur joints ke aas paas muscle tenderness hai, mujhe normal se zyada hair loss ho raha hai, raat ko right calf mein horrible cramps ho rahe hain, mujhe hot flashes aate hain phir mujhe thand lagti hai aur garmi nahi le paati, meri energy nahi hai, meri skin bahut dry hai aur tingling ho rahi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the potential causes for joint pain, knee swelling, muscle tenderness, hair loss, cramps, temperature changes, fatigue, and dry skin? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. There is swelling in the knee and deformation made the legs to bend inwards.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste doctor, Main ek 43 saal ki mahila hoon aur mere sarir mein khujli, lalima aur jaln wale daane ho gaye hain. Sab ye daane mere right arm par, eyebrow ke upar, right upper nose area mein, jaw aur chin area par, right chest aur upper back par hai aur wo sunlight se jyada react karte hain, aur ab ye aur bhi bura ho raha hai. Maine bahut saari blood tests karvaye hain, jiska result lupus aur dusre cheezein ke liye negative aaya hai, lekin mere hs-CRP level bahut high hai. Meri sirf ek grandmother ko neurodermatitis ki severe history hai, aur mere bachpan mein mujhe asthma tha. Main bahut pareshan hoon kyunki sunlight exposed rash ki biopsy mein interface dermatitis with mucin dikha, jiski vajah se lupus, tumid lupus, dermatomyositis, connective tissue aur collagen vascular disorder ki shanka hai, waise ki vasculitis to nahi hai. Mujhe bahut badi chinta hai. Kya biopsy in bimariyon ke liye conclusive hai. Kya mujhe inme se koi bimari hai. Mujhe lagta hai ki ye daane hormone se related hai, lekin ye chale nahi jaate aur PMS aur alcohol consumption ke time aur badh jaate hain. Mere pariwar mein lupus ya inme se koi bhi or bimari ki koi history nahi hai. Mere muscles mein koi problem nahi hai. Lekin mere ungliyon par kuch lalima hai. Kabhi-kabhi diverticulitis ke liye main Cipro leti hoon. Kisi bhi tarah ke steroids cream lagane se khujli kam ho jati hai, lekin phir aur bhi bura ho jata hai. Kripya madad karein. Uski image attach ki gayi hai neeche.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's rash indicative of lupus, tumid lupus, dermatomyositis, or a connective tissue disorder? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, main apne 4 saal ke bacche ko nature center le gaya tha aur mujhe waha par ek horse fly bite hua tha. Mujhe notice hua ki uske ghutne ke piche ek katua hai jisme red dot hai, swelling hai aur uske ghutne ke piche puri jagah redness hai. Main ye kaise pata karu ki ye ek allergic reaction hai ya kuch pareshani ki baat hai aur sath hi affected area ko kaise safe tarike se treat karu. Kripya doctor, dekhein is vartaman condition ko.
multimodal_Question_summ: What should I do about my 4-year-old's horse fly bite behind the knee with redness, swelling, and a red dot? The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. There is swelling in the knee and red bruises.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe 4-5 din se athletes foot hai. Ye pinky toe ke neeche ek blister se shuru hua tha. Ab wo toe chhod ke 4th right toe par pahunch gaya hai. Kal wo dard karne laga aur toe ke neeche ek sujan hone ki aahat mahsus hui. Kripya dekhein something happened on foot below. Bas thoda sa dabav aur thodi si safed peep nikli. Aaj jab main kaam se ghar aaya, maine check kiya toh mere toes ke beech mein bahut saari khoon wali peep thi. Ye jagah dard kar rahi hai aur thodi si sujan hai. Ab tak maine tinactin spray, lotramin cream aur lotramin powder ka istemal kiya hai. Athletes foot ki scaling seemit ho gayi hai lekin ek aisi jagah hai jahan khoon wali peep nikalti hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What is the recommended treatment for athletes foot that has led to a sore, oozing area with bloody pus? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The foot is swollen blue black discolour.

Hinglish_Question: Namaste, mere 6 saal ke bete ne bahut buri headache se uth gaya hai, med.-high fever; red eyes, aur ro raha hai. Please doctor, dekhiye in aankhon ko neeche. Maine use childrens advil diya hai aur ab bas ye soch rahi hoon ki kya mujhe aur karna chahiye, aur kab use uske pediatrition ke paas le jana chahiye. Wo kabhi bimar nahi hota, matter of fact ye pehli baar hai ki wo bimar hua hai school shuru hone ke baad Sept mein.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should a 6-year-old with headache, fever, red eyes, and crying be taken to the pediatrician after taking children's Advil? The image here shows a medical condition related to eye_redness. The eye has started to become red from canthus, also there is a swelling in the canthus of the eye.

Hinglish_Question: PMS ho sakta hai. (Yeh perfect timing hai.) Mujhe sirf itna pata lagana hai jo itna terrifying na ho. Meri pass general practitioner ke saath 3 din baad doctor ke appointment hai (jo pehle bhi right node examine kiya tha), lekin tab tak dimaag ka upyog band karna chahti hoon. Haan, mujhe pata hai ki cancer ek possibility hai, lekin mujhe koi aur symptoms nahi hai aur ek samajhdar jawaab ki talash hai. Doctor, kripya neeche diye gaye image ko dekhein. Kisi bhi tarah ki madad bahut appreciated hogi.
multimodal_Question_summ: Patient presents with knee swelling and anxiety, seeking a rational answer before doctor's appointment in 3 days. The image here shows a medical condition related to knee_swelling. The left knee is swollen wild mid redness.

Hinglish_Question: Mere paas almost a month se tonsillitis hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Mujhe tonsillitis ka history toh hai lekin last one and a half year se meri throat kaafi theek hai, lekin mujhe lagta hai ki maine ye Infection ek hospital visit par apne relative ko dekhne se catch kiya hai aur tab se mai septillin aur gargles use kar raha hoon ye inflammation treat karne ke liye lekin ye bilkul bhi nahi ja raha hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: Is the patient's persistent swollen tonsils and history of tonsillitis related to a recent hospital visit? The image here shows a medical condition related to swollen_tonsils. There swollen red mass present in the back of the throat.

Hinglish_Question: Mere three year old beta ke sar par white crusty scabs hai. Pehle mujhe dry patches notice huye the, par wo usually attached nahi hote the. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Ab maine kuch attached patches bhi dhoondh liye hain. Wo uske sar par lumps ki tarah feel hote hain par peel off ho jaate hain. Kya aap mujhe bata sakte hain ye kya hain.
multimodal_Question_summ:
What is the cause of white crusty scabs on a three-year-old's scalp that are attached and feel like lumps? The image shows the condition of dry scalp. Dryness with pink coloured patch present on the scalp.
Condition- Dry scalp.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe do hafto pehle seizure hua tha. Main cement par gir gayi thi aur mere face, lower gums aur jaw bahut zyada injured ho gaye the. Zyadatar soojan kam ho gayi hai lekin meri moo mein aisa lag ra hai ki mere lip ke neeche chewing tobacco hai. Please dekhiye, affected area ki image neeche di gayi hai. C rays mein kuch dikh nahi raha hai. Kya aap mujhe mere baare mein kuch ideas de sakte hain? Dhanyavaad, Shauna Hi, kya main aapki sehat se judi sawal ka jawab de sakti hoon? Kripya yahaan apna sawal type karein...
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of numbness in the lower gums and jaw, accompanied by lip swelling and a recent seizure? The image here shows a medical condition related to foot_swelling. The ankle of the foot is swollen with brown discolouration.

Hinglish_Question: Mere cousin bro ko almost 2 hafte se on and off fever ho raha hai. Fir jab usko admit kiya gaya toh doctor ne kaha ki uske kidney ki wajah se fever se infection ho gaya hai aur dialysis karni hogi. Please doctor, dekhiye is vartaman condition ko. Woh diabetic patient bhi hai kareeb 20 saal se. Ab problem ye hai ki doctor ne kaha ki shayad kuch bacteria infected hai aur medicine di gayi,par abhi toh RBCs aur hemoglobin normal level se zyada ho gaye hain. Use ertapenem aur meropenem bhi liya hai. Symptoms dialysis ke baad vomiting aur diarrhea hui. Ab uska chehra kaala pad gaya hai aur body mein rashes hain aur skin kafi gadbad ho rahi hai. Isliye doctor ne ICU mein admit hone ki salah di hai. Doctor kya aapko lagta hai ki koi aur viruses uske body ko infect kar sakte hain. Woh bilkul energyless hai aur bahut kamzor hai aur khana bhi nahi le sakta. Kripya kuch solution dijiye...
multimodal_Question_summ: Is there a possibility that the patient's worsening symptoms, such as darkening of face, body rashes, and weakness, could be caused by other viral infections? The image here shows a medical condition related to edema. The leg has two red band like marks.

Hinglish_Question: 1983 mein mujhe subarachnoid hemorrhage hua tha aur arterly clipped and tied hui. Meri awaaz intubation ke kaaran hoarse hai, usse ab adat ho gayi hai. Lekin haal hi mein mera dentist mujhe bataya ki meri left side ki salivary gland paralyzed hai... Main sirf paani peeta hoon. Mu mouth hamesha dry rehta hai aur meine apna 'baby bottle of water' pura din, har din apne saath rakha hua hai. Kripya dekhein image of the affected area doctor neeche. Mujhe apni left side ki tongue kat li hai aur mujhe usse koi mehsoos nahi hua, left side facial hemiparesis ke kaaran... Kya kiya jaa sakta hai... kuch...
multimodal_Question_summ:
What treatment options are available for a patient with subarachnoid hemorraghe, hoarse voice, dry mouth, and tongue biting? The image shows the condition of mouth ulcers. White coloured circular patch/ swelling with red coloured margin present on the inner skin of lower lip, imner skin of left cheek, above the teeth and below the tongue.
Condition- Aphthous ulcer

Hinglish_Question: Piece of skin jo meri bottom lip ko mere teeth ke gums se attach karti hai, wo mere receding gums ki wajah se bahut neeche tak harkar hi chali gayi hai. Jab bhi mein apna muh move karta hoon, woh skin piece mere mouse ke upar ragad deti hai aur iski wajah se wo swollen aur bahut hi dardnaak aur sore ho gayi hai. Iske liye mujhe kya karna chahiye. Kripya dekhein is affected area ki image doctor, mentioned below.
multimodal_Question_summ: What can be done for the painful and swollen piece of skin between the bottom lip, gums, and receding gums? The image shows the condition of Lip Swelling. Swelling present on the entire lower lip with yellowish fluid near the end and dried flakes on the lips.

Hinglish_Question: Meri chhoti si beti, jiski umr 7 saal hai, abhi gir kar ek dolls house par sir ko laga diya hai. Usko headache hai aur uski aankh ka palak bruised and swollen hai. Please doctor, dekhiye is aankhon ko neeche. Usne 20 minutes ke liye ice pack lagaya hua hai aur abhi bhi swollen hai, lekin wo ab so gayi hai. Kya mujhe kuch chinta karne ki baat hai. Dhanyavad.
multimodal_Question_summ: Should I be worried about my 7-year-old daughter's swollen and bruised eyelid after bumping her head? The image shows the condition of swollen eye. Big swelling of the entire eyelid and also below the eye. Looks Dark red and little shiny.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe ek skin allergy hai jo shuru me ek rash ki tarah dikhti hai, phir kuch ghanton ke andar eczema ki tarah flare up ho jati hai aur bahut jyada khujli hoti hai. Ab se ek saal se chal rahi hai, maine har tarah ke moisturizers aur antihistamines try kiye hain, mere gp ne hydrocortisone prescribe kiya tha, ye kaam karta hai lekin kuch din baad flareup firse ho jati hai! Kal mere new gp ke paas gayi thi, aur unhone kaha ki ye fungal ho sakta hai, isliye unhone mujhe Daktacort cream di, maine ise 3 baar istemal kiya hai abhi tak, aur har baar jab main ise istemal karti hoon toh meri chehre par turant redness aur jalan hoti hai aur fir mere hontho aur aankhon ke kone par chote-chote tukde dikhayi dete hain. Ye mere chehre par hai, mere baal ki line par bhi aur mere peeche ek patch bhi hai. Meri skin bahut dry hai, isliye wo wrinkly dikhti hai, har moisturiser ka chubhhan ho jati hai, paani ya zaitoon ka tel bhi chubhhan ho jata hai. Kripya doctor, vartaman condition ko dekhein. Mujhe aisa lagta hai jaise main ek dusre ke mask pehenne wali ek dusri skin ki hai jo kathoration ho jati hai, lal ho jati hai aur bahut jyada khujli hoti hai. Mujhe nahi pata kya karu, kripya meri madad karein. Bahut bahut dhanyavaad!
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of skin allergy with rash, eczema-like flare-ups, extreme dryness, redness, itching, and burning? The image here shows a medical condition related to skin_dryness. The peels of the skin near the later the eye are coming out and the skin is dry.

Hinglish_Question: Hi, main ek 32 saal ka purush hoon aur mere mathewale par ek rash hai, kabhi kabhi, karib 9 mahine se. Jab mujhe ye rash hota hai, to ye 1-2 hafte tak rahta hai, phir thoda kam ho jata hai, lekin puri tarah se nahi jata. Jab mujhe rash hone wala hota hai, to mere mathewale mein tez, chubhne wale, jalan wale sensation hote hain, fir skin mein chote vesicles nikal aate hain. Mujhe ye samajh nahi aa raha ki ye kya ho sakta hai, mujhe insurance nahi hai, isliye mujhe Veterans Affairs clinic par depend karna padta hai lekin wahaan par appointment lene mein bahut samay lagta hai, isliye maine socha ki is website ko try kar lu. Uski attached image neeche di gayi hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be causing my persistent facial rash, characterized by vesicles, sharp tingling, and stinging sensations on my forehead? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe bahut jyada dikkat ho rahi hai keede ke katne se, bahar. Kabhi koi problem nahi hoti thi, is saal shuru hui hai. Yahan humare paas machar, bichua, kali machar, cheete aur ghode machar hai. Mujhe sahi tarike se nahi pata ke kaun mujhe kat raha hai. Mujhe ek normal bug welt hota hai, phir kuch ghante baad wo laal ho jata hai, hives ban jate hain, suj jate hain aur dard karte hain. Mujhe do din pehle ek katne ki wajah se pinjre mein dard ho raha hai aur abhi bhi wo lal, suj gaya hai. Sujan pair ke upar se upar tak hai.Please doctor dekhiye is vartaman condition ko below. Mere pindli mein bhi ek kat gaya hai aur agar aap dabate hain to bahut dard hota hai, ab wo laal ho raha hai aur dard kar raha hai. Mujhe chakkar bhi aate hain aur jab zyada ho jaye to main benedryl le rahi hoon. Kya koi wajah hai ki itni badi reactions ho rahi hain mujhe itni sudden tarike se.
multimodal_Question_summ: Why is the patient suddenly experiencing severe reactions to bug bites, with redness, swelling, pain, and dizziness? The image here shows the condition of foot swelling

Hinglish_Question: Hey, mere peeth aur chhati ke kuch hisso par aur mere sharir ke aur kuch hisso par bhi mujhe khaarish hui hai. Garmi isse aur bhi bura kar deti hai. Yeh dard ya khaarish nahi hoti hai. Yeh bhure se laal rang ki hai. Kya aapko pata hai yeh kya ho sakta hai? Mujhe iski problem lagbhag ek saal se hai aur dheere dheere badhti ja rahi hai. Uska image neeche attach kiya hua hai.
multimodal_Question_summ: What could be the cause of a non-itchy, brownish red rash on the back and chest that worsens with heat? The image shows the condition of skin rash. Round and swollen spots on the skin, red in color and multiple in the affected area.

Hinglish_Question: Mujhe ek ghumne wala rash hai, ye mere gardan par shuru hua, thoda sa mere chehre par, mere kaanon par aur mere sar ke neeche ke baalon ki line par. Isme khujli hoti hai. Ye kuch ghante mein mere seeney aur poori torse tak spread ho gaya, lekin ye ek solid red skin discolouration ban gaya hai, koi bumpy ya dotted rash nahi hai. Jab ye move karta hai, to pehle ki jagah se clear lagta hai. Mainne spray benydryl aur benydryl syrup bhi use kiya tha, kyun ki mujhe laga ki ye hives ho sakta hai. Lekin ye theek nahi hua. Sone ke waqt tak, laal rang thighs aur arms tak spread ho gaya. Raat ko, khujli wale hanthon se utha aur subah tak laal rang pairon aur pairo ki ungliyon tak move ho gaya. Ab lag raha hai ki rash phir se sar, chehra, gardan, arm pits aur arms par shuru ho gaya hai... abhi tak. Doston aur pariwar se poochne par, ye mono ya rubella bhi ho sakta hai. Kya aap meri madad kar sakte hain. Main ek 35 saal ki mahila hoon. Uski tasveer neeche attach ki gayi hai.

Hinglish_Question: OK....Mujhe most likely A strain flu infection ho gayi hai....mere incubation symptoms mein right arm soreness hai jo kuch dinon ke liye aata hai aur jaata hai, mere upper right back mein slight tightness hai aur kal se thoda scratchy throat hai jo kuch had tak kam ho gaya hai (actual hard raw sore throat jo ab kisi bhi samay aa sakta hai). Aur sirf kal maine kuch (WAVES) of nausea (no vomiting) experience kiya...kuch kha nahi sakte the...wo khatam ho gaya hai aur aaj kuch khaya ja sakta hai lekin slight queaziness hai. Jab ye shuru hua tha to mere paas thick yellow mucus tha...ab wo gayab ho chuka hai aur mere body par (jise adhikansh logo ka pata nahi hota) har virus ke pehle ya to legs par ya hath aur arm par ek ya do chote se bluish marks hote hain...is baar dono jagah par. Virus hamesha tab break out hota hai jab ye spots gayab ho jaate hain aur abhi tak main usi stage par hoon. Kya ye A N3H2 monster hai? Please dekhein doctor, niche di gayi image ko.

Hinglish_Question: Halo doctor, mujhe teen saal se sharir ke alag-alag hisson me khujli ho rahi hai. Ye sardi ke mausam me badhti hai, lekin garmi ke mausam mein bhi rehti hai. Mujhe pehle sir ki rusi, chehre ki khujli aur daane hote the, jinhe theek kar diya gaya tha. Iski tasveer neeche attach ki gayi hai. Abhi, mere peeche ke madhya hisse, gaal ke peechhe baalo ke peeche, pet ke paas, private parts ke paas, haath ke kuch hisse aur pair ke kuch hisson mein khujli ki problem hai. Khujli zyadatar shaam aur raat me hoti hai. Jab mai khujlane lagta hoon, toh kuch chipchipa taral nikalta hai. Pichle sardi mein, maine skin doctor ko dikhaaya tha aur unhone mujhe khujli se pidit hone ka diagnosis scabies diya tha. Unhone kuch creams aur dawaiyaan di thin, lekin uska thoda sa madad hua tha. Garmi ke mausam mein, mujhe sharir ke hisson me zyada itching nahi hui thi, lekin khujli ki jagah par kuch eczema jaise daane nikal aaye. Jab mai us affected area par Lobate GM cream use karta hoon, toh ek hafte ke andar kuch rahat aur dikhne mein bhi farak padta hai, lekin phir se spots aur khujli ho jaati hai. Maine apne affected area ki photos click ki hai. Kya aap meri is samasya ka ilaj karne mein madad kar sakte hain?
